string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 1
Form : Animal

A small and vulnerable monster that is found all throughout Maple Island and Victoria Island. There are so many of these little monsters around that there's even a saying that goes, "snail is as snail does". Snails are easy targets for beginners. There has never been any adventurer who's ever been defeated by the Snail, so if you're the kind of adventurer that likes to challenge yourself, it might not be such a bad idea to try and actually be defeated by this Snail!
A player who's reached Lv. 1 on the 3 Snail Skill could use the Snail's shell as a throwable weapon too.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 2
Form : Animal

The Blue Snail is found all throughout Maple Island and Victoria Island. It's the bigger and badder version of the regular Snail with a bigger body frame as well as stronger attack strengths, but even with all its enhancements, it is still a monster that can easily be defeated by beginners. It's hard to say, however, why the Snail turned blue while it grew bigger!
A player who's reached Lv. 2 on the 3 Snail Skill could use the Blue Snail's shell as a throwable weapon too.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 15
Form : Plant
Special Trait : Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A Green Mushroom monster with a dull looking cap. It is a transformed version of the small poisonous mushrooms and is therefore immune to poison. These mushrooms are often spotted around construction sites or near dungeon entrances. These mushrooms are most likely poisonous so beware not to eat them no matter how hungry you are!

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 10
Form : Plant
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A darker version of Stump, the tree stump monster. These monsters are often spotted around mountain highlands. While they are very similar to the Stump in their dried-up appearance, these Dark Stumps retain some moisture and are still able to grow leaves somewhere inside their body. The Dark Stump has a lot stronger attacks and defenses as compared to Stump, so be careful not to confuse the two, especially if you're a beginner!

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 12
Form : Animal
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks.

Hardly an octopus, this mutated octopus-like monster is a strange-looking creature that looks like it escaped from a research lab on some other planet after being relentlessly tested on. There's apparently some people who like to cook fried meatballs with the legs from these creatures. They are often found around swamps and in the deep forest, but have been spotted lately around construction sites and other high altitude areas, which seems to support the whole alien theory of their origins.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 17
Form : Plant

A monster from a legendary story about a lumberjack who'd left his axe in a tree stump. The tree stump apparently was reborn into this monster as a result of its unresolved past life as a tree stump with an axe stuck into it. In any case, this Axe Stump seems perfect to use as firewood. It is very tough, just like all the Stump family of monsters.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 19
Form : Plant

A strange tree stump that's only found around the Sharenian Excavation Sites. According to some archaeologists, this very unique stump may be growing its leaf with the power of the ancient aura that is constantly emanating out of the Excavation Sites. It is questionable, though, as to whether any more leaves will actually grow out of this Ghost Stump.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 2
Form : Plant

A small mushroom monster that is often found in grassy areas. It is relatively fast for a low-level monster, but beginners could easily defeat these mushrooms with a little practice. These look a lot like the Orange Mushroom monsters but they actually have a smaller frame and have meaner looking faces compared to the Orange Mushroom. It tends to disburse mushroom spores in the air, which is likely the reason why there are so many mushroom monsters all throughout Maple World!

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 7
Form : Mammal

A speedy monster that attacks with its massive body. You'll need to do everything you can to get away from this guy, or else it'll come attacking you with massive strength. It is possible to catch one of these Pigs, though, and the Pig's head is apparently quite a delicacy in Maple World.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 10
Form : Mammal

There's always a sense of order, even in the world of Pigs. The most powerful of them wear a bright red ribbon which symbolizes their overpowering strength over others, and are treated as royalty. You don't believe it? Just go and try to hunt one of these Ribbon Pigs. You'll see that Ribbon Pigs are more powerful than ordinary Pigs.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 8
Form : Plant

A mushroom monster spotted everywhere in Maple Island and Victoria Island. They like to hide out in peoples' homes and eat up all their food, which will turn them into the powerful Mushmoms.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 15
Form : Spirit

Part of the Slime family of monsters, the Bubbling lives in dark, underground regions. It is much faster than the regular Slime and has a much higher Avoidability which makes it a much more difficult target to hunt for beginners.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 4
Form : Plant
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A monster that resembles a tree stump that is most often found in grassy areas and the highlands. Its short legs used to be the tree's roots. It move very slowly and the tree stump can only make weak attacks, but it is also surprisingly tough which makes beginners have to spend a long time to defeat this monster.
The eye on this Stump often scares people, but the single eye will apparently shed a tear from time to time. This rare occasion serves as the origination of the people of Perion referring to valuables as the Tear of Stump.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 4
Form : Animal

There's apparently a rumor going around that says that the Blue Snails will turn red after leveling-up from their incessant combating, but such a rumor has not been confirmed. This monster can be spotted everywhere throughout Maple Island and Victoria Island. It has a strong attack, especially for a snail, which may make it somewhat of a challenging opponent for a beginner.
A player who's reached Lv.3 on the 3 Snail Skill could use the Red Snail's shell as a throwable weapon too.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 20
Form : Mammal

A female Desert Rabbit found in deserts. Has a characteristically small pair of ears and a round body. Its staple food are clovers and carrots which grow around oases, and so these Desert Rabbits tend to be very good at finding food and water even in the deep desert. Desert Rabbits were apparently beloved pets that used to be raised by many desert nomads.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 21
Form : Mammal

A male Desert Rabbit that lives only in the desert as its name defines. Its small ears and round body render this monster unique, not to mention its ability to find food and water in the seemingly barren desert. It feeds on clovers and carrots, and it has frequently served as a pet to the nomads in the desert.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 22
Form : Plant
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A type of cactus plant that lives only in the desert. This youngling is still not old enough to get out of its nappy. But before you pick it up to hold this cute, waddling monster, remember that the cactus needles that cover its body can inflict injury.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 25
Form : Plant
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A cactus that lives only in the desert. As the two bumps on its head indicate, this Cactus is a full-grown Jr. Cactus. This monster wears an apron and is one of the forms that a fully grown Cactus can take. This Cactus is always preoccupied with chores and taking care of Jr. Cactus. It is quite possible that you will come across a clothesline around these cacti with clean laundry hanging. This, of course, belongs to the Cactus with an apron.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 28
Form : Plant
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A cactus that lives only in the desert. As the two bumps on its head indicate, this Cactus is a full-grown Jr. Cactus. The Royal Cactus is one of the forms that a fully grown Jr. Cactus can take, although it frequently gets yelled at for still acting like an immature Jr. Cactus.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 23
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A type of Necki that lives only in the desert. Not only can the Bellamoa see far with its two huge eyes, but it could also seduce the adventurers exploring at night with its jingling bell tied to the ribbon around its neck. But don't worry! This monster is not poisonous.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 24
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A type of lizard that lives only in the desert. Although it always looks weary in the hot weather, the Ear Plug Plead wears a pair of furry and raggedy earmuffs. It does not have the presence or aura of a monster, and this becomes even more evident when it scurries around the desert looking fatigued.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 27
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A type of lizard that lives only in the desert. Why the Scarf Plead wears a scarf around its neck in a blazing hot desert remains a mystery. This monster can be found aimlessly scampering around due to the thin skin on its feet that can easily incur a burn from the scorching desert sand if it stays stationary.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 29
Form : Mammal

A type of meer cat that only lives in the desert. The Meerkat has the tendency to whip out its telescope whenever it hears a noise. Although it looks nothing like a cat, it will rarely drop a Cat's Eye as if it is trying to prove that it really is in the felidae family... not that its eyes actually look like those of a cat or anything.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 6
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks.

A monster made of a gelatinous substance that uses its own viscosity to jump around everywhere. The cuteness of its look makes the Slime a beloved monster amongst adventurers, which is why you'll often come across all sorts of Slime paraphernalia such as hats and earrings that are being sold. When you hunt the Slime, you'll end up with small pockets of liquid which have a very pleasant apple scent. The scented liquid can be used in cooking as well! Sometimes, it will give the pompom on its head to the adventurers.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 22
Form : Plant

A mushroom monster with a bunch of horns on its head. These mushrooms are most often spotted in dark areas such as underground dungeons or in tree dungeons. When the Green Mushroom doesn't get enough sunlight, it apparently loses its poison and starts to grow horns on its head. Remember though, that this doesn't mean that the Horny Mushrooms are without any poison. They can be just as poisonous so don't ever try to eat them!

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 24
Form : Mammal

A type of Talpidae that lives only in the desert. It hunts for food under the sand. It has a good rapport with the Sand Dwarves, so it is frequently seen carrying a small Sand Dwarf on its head.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 29
Form : Animal

A type of scorpion that lives only in the desert. Although it has a poisonous sting on its tail, the sting is rarely used to attack; only a very few number of people have been attacked by its sting. In that sense, Russellon, who lost an eye to the Scorpion, is a very rare case.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 22
Form : Plant
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A monster with an incredible legend behind it. This Dark Axe Stump is apparently the deeply agitated form of the Axe Stump who'd had an unresolved past life as a tree stump with an axe left in it by some lumberjack. The Dark Axe Stump, just like all the other members of the Stump family of monsters, is extremely tough and is capable of strong attacks, so all beginners should be very very careful. Some of the Dark Axe Stumps are very old, and will ocassionally contain ancient tree sap.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 21
Form : Reptile

A small snake-like monster that is most often found in swamps and areas that are damp and wet. Tends to move extremely fast and has a high level of Avoidability as well as Accuracy, which makes it a difficult target. If you're not confident about your Accuracy of attack, stay away from Jr. Necki. It's advised that you ignore Luke, the guard's request at the dungeon entrance until you've leveled-up high enough to handle this monster.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 20
Form : Animal

The oldest snail in Maple World. It has a huge body that has developed over the years and a white mustache that suits his old age. He enjoys the morning dew, so one may frequently spot him wandering around to consume the dew on green leaves every morning. If fortunate enough, one can acquire a Rainbow-colored Snail Shell which is said to grant its owner a wish.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 20
Form : Plant

A mushroom monster with a blue cap. It is the fattest looking mushroom of all the mushrooms in that family of monsters. For a mushroom, which are just about everywhere throughout Maple World, it is one of the rarer breeds. But go nearby Henesys and you'll find yourself entering into the Blue Mushroom Forest! These mushrooms will give up some gold at times, enriching the lives of many happy adventurers.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 27
Form : Reptile

A lizard monster that is spotted around the depths of the Sleepywood dungeons in large herds. It is as evil and ill-tempered as it looks, directing all sorts of aggression toward adventurers. Go into Sleepywood and you'll find the area that's been overrun by the Evil Eyes. If you find yourself in the Cave of Evil Eye, just stay calm and slowly extricate yourself from the situation!

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 24
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks. Affected by Heal.

A mushroom monster that was reincarnated from previously dead mushrooms that were destroyed by adventurers by attaching a charm on its head. Who knows why anyone would do such a thing? In any case, these mushrooms have strong attacks, defenses as well as speed, but are extremely vulnerable to light.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 25
Form : Mammal

Pig monsters who'd started to question the class distinctions between regular Pigs and the Ribbon Pigs and decided to retreat into the highlands. These Pigs had to train themselves to adapt to the rough terrains of the highlands and have as a result turned into powerful Wild Boars with great body strength and large scary teeth.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 23
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A tiny monster that lives inside Eos Tower and appears in the form of a spider. It is rather resistant to attacks with sanctity attribute, although it is vulnerable to attacks with fire attribute. It has the tendency to weave webs anywhere and everywhere, so you must always be on the lookout when going into the tower where Trixters abound.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 28
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A tiny monster that lives inside Eos Tower and appears in the form of a spider. It is called the Green Trixter for its green color, and has the tendency to weave webs anywhere and everywhere, just like a regular Trixter. The Green Trixter is immune to poison and is stronger than a regular Trixter, so be cautious.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 23
Form : Fish
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A monster that appears in the form of a green sea horse near the Aqua Road, in the shallow end of the sea. It looks like it's wearing a helmet, and it has become more ferocious lately because the force of purification of Aqua Road has weakened.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 25
Form : Fish
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A small sea-horse-like monster that lives near Aqua Road. Its tail is coiled back while it has a flashy crown-like ornament on its head, which makes it more difficult for the people to spot when it is hiding in between the corals. It prefers to live only in clean sea water where no signs of contamination can be seen. As a result of the recent pollution in Aqua Road, Cico has lately become more ferocious.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 24
Form : Fish
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A cute little monster that appears in the form of a fish with bright orange and white stripes. Although it is loved and adored for its cute image, it chases its enemy with a huge frown on its face when attacking.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 22
Form : Fish
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A sea creature that is covered in prickly black thorns. It may be mistaken for a black stone, but when you look at it closely, the Pinboom moves in a sluggish and subtle way. Although it sticks out its sharp thorns when instigated, it usually hides its thorns and remains still.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 28
Form : Fish
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning and Poison Attribute Attacks.

A monster that appears in the form of a fish near the sea east of Aqua Road. It was born in the midst of huge sea bubbles, hence the name 'Bubble Fish'. Like a bubble, its body is translucent, often used as a defense mechanism to hide from its enemies.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 23
Form : Devil

A mysterious creature that wears a wooden mask over its head and plays pranks, it is often spotted around Perion's Excavation Site. There is apparently a rumor that claims that the Wooden Mask is a monster that formed from the power eminating from the Excavation Site and another rumor that says that it was a tree that was transformed into a monster as a result of this same power. However, at this point, no one knows its origins for sure. Some scholars even speculate that the Wooden Mask is a fairy that only lives in the highlands, but not many are in support of that theory, especially considering how ugly this monster looks on the outside.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 24
Form : Devil

A mysterious creature that wears a heavy stone mask over its head and plays pranks. There are a number of theories surrounding its origins, just like the Wooden Mask, but no one knows anything about these creatures for sure. The Rocky Mask is very curious about many things and therefore tends to grab anything that it deems interesting, which means it steals peoples' belongings frequently.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 29
Form : Fish
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire and Poison Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A monster that appears in the form of a fish near the sea east of Aqua Road. It has a colorful body and a appendage on its head that looks like a flower, giving it the name Flower Fish. This flower helps it camouflage, which can deceive many adventurers. Contrary to its pretty and flashy appearance, it is actually quite lazy and sluggish.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 20
Form : Mammal

A monster that resembles a small bat. It doesn't like being exposed to light and is therefore usually spotted in dark and damp areas such as in underground subway tracks or in dungeons. Tends to fly at a high speed which makes it hard to attack from close by. It also has a high level of Avoidability, so it requires a certain amount of agility in order to bring it down.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 30
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Lightning and Holy Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A round monster that can be frequently seen in the old tower near Orbis. It was created for the purpose of guarding the tower. Its body is covered in a firm layer comprised of stone, and its ability to quickly separate its body to use a hidden apparatus to shoot a laser render it a challenging monster to defeat. It is resistant to attacks of sanctity and electricity attribute but vulnerable to attacks of ice attribute, so attack this monster using magic of ice attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 30
Form : Spirit

A monster that very much resembles a little human with wings. It is a type of fairy but it became tainted and corrupted when the Black Magician ruled over Maple World. The Fairy has magic capabilities and can withstand large amounts of magic attacks. It can cast spells on itself and its opponents, making it a rather annoying creature to battle for many adventurers.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 30
Form : Enchanted

A brown teddy bear manufactured at the toy factory in Ludibrium. It is stuffed with cotton balls and has a windup spring on its back. This monster is being controlled by an unknown force that has originated from the Dimensional Schism.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 30
Form : Fish
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A monster that appears in the form of a prawn near the sea, east of Aqua Road. Unlike what it appears on the outside, Krip's dignified pride will not allow itself to bend over backwards for anyone. It bounces around with its arms crossed, and it is said to have become irritable due to the weakening of the Aqua Road purification.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 32
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire and Ice Attribute Attacks.

A sand dwarf that only lives in the desert. It is obsessed with jewels, and carries around a big bag to collect the Lithium it constantly searches for hidden under the sand.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 30
Form : Bird

A type of eagle that lives only in the desert. Perhaps due to the strong sun rays, Kiyo is mostly bald at the top of its head, somewhat resembling a baldheaded old man.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 32
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A swamp monster in the form of an alligator. Ligator is found slowly crawling around the swamps outside Kerning City and the marshes outside Thailand with sleepy eyes. It may have powerful attacks, but it is very slow, as well as vulnerable to fire attribute attacks.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 32
Form : Enchanted

A pink teddy bear manufactured at the toy factory in Ludibrium. It has a cute yellow ribbon around its neck. This monster is controlled by an unknown force originating from the Dimensional Schism.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 32
Form : Enchanted

A white toy rat that has a windup spring on its back. It scurries around the Eos Tower endlessly. Although it was originally manufactured to catch other rats, it has transformed into a monster due to the effects brought on by the Temporal Schism.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 32
Form : Enchanted

A slime that the Zenumist alchemists in Magatia created. It bounces around boasting its elasticity, as it is mainly composed of gelatin. Although some say this pink monster resembles a delicious strawberry jelly, it is not edible. Do not consume this dangerous monster.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 32
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

An old dwarf that lives only in the desert. It looks just like the Desert Dwarf, only darker. It traverses the desert with its two children by its side and a cane that it uses to detect lithium ore hidden under the sand. It is infamous for its ferocity, and carries around the flames of the desert.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 35
Form : Enchanted

An organism created by the Zenumist alchemists in Magatia. It moves around via the cylinder it was created in to attack humans. Although the Rumo appears in the form of a plant, it does not display any of the graceful qualities that most plants embody. This small monster could become even more threatening if it grows any further.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 38
Form : Enchanted

An organism created by the Zenumist alchemists in Magatia. This monster has become more powerful than a single Rumo. Looking at this Triple Rumo, it seems highly unlikely that the Rumo leaves are as rare and hard to find as people claim.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 32
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

Some of the Wild Boar who were training hard in the mountain plateaus became inspired by the heat of the sun, which caused a big spark on its back. The Fire Boar has been able to harness the sun's heat, and an increased fighting spirit, becoming a great example for all the fighters of Perion. Once in a while, though, the overly zealous Wild Boar will spark too big of a fire on its back and instead of transforming into a Fire Boar, turns itself into a piece of roasted barbecue, offering a great meal for the fighters of Perion.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 33
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A monster that lives in the Garden of Red in Orbis. Stay away from its inviting coat of soft white fur that is red at the tips, as it is deceivingly hot! It is still too young to know how to attack with its element, so it uses its small horn. However, it has the attribute of fire which can be dangerous in the future!

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 33
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A monster that lives in the Garden of Yellow in Orbis. Stay away from its inviting coat of soft white fur that is gold at the tips, as it is saturated with the attribute of electricity! It is still too young to know how to attack with its element, so it uses its small horn. However, it has the attribute of lightning which can be dangerous in the future!

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 33
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A monster that lives in the Garden of Green in Orbis. Stay away from its inviting coat of soft white fur that is purple at the tips, as it is deceivingly cold! It is still too young to know how to attack with its element, so it uses its small horn. However, it has the attribute of ice, which can be dangerous in the future!

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 36
Form : Enchanted

A panda bear manufactured at the toy factory in Ludibrium. It has a windup spring on its back, but is controlled by an unknown force that originated from the Dimensional Schism. Once a cuddly stuffed animal, this Panda Teddy has undergone a drastic change and has become a dangerous monster.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 34
Form : Enchanted

A family of ducks manufactured at the toy factory in Ludibrium. These toy ducks, comprised of a mother duck and her three ducklings that follow behind, are being controlled by an unknown force originating from the Dimensional Schism.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 34
Form : Enchanted

A black toy rat that has a windup spring on its back. Although it was originally manufactured to catch other rats, it has transformed into a monster due to the effects brought on by the Temporal Schism.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 36
Form : Enchanted

A yellow toy helicopter that appears along the upper exterior walls of Eos Tower in Ludibrium. It uses rotor propellers to move, although it usually gets thrown around by the current of strong winds.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 34
Form : Spirit

There are particular entities that linger the infinitude of the space-time continuum, where no ordinary creature can reach by ordinary means; Tick is one of them. Capitalizing on the Dimensional Schism, Tick can be found in the deserted Ludibrium Clocktower, feeding on time.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 36
Form : Enchanted

A fuzzy and striped toy rat with a windup spring on its back. While it shares all but one letter of its name with Ratz, Retz can only be found in Helios Tower, eating and hoarding everything it its path. Its huge appetite and penchant for hoarding food has caused the current rice shortage in the Korean Folk Town.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 36
Form : Animal
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice and Fire Attribute Attacks.

A Pepe that has evolved to live in water. Found in the water-filled basement of Orbis Tower, Scuba Pepe is smaller than an ordinary Pepe but illustrates a higher intelligence. A family of Scuba Pepes have expanded their habitat all the way to the entrance of Aqua Road using the hole that was created during the weakening of Aqua Road purification.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 37
Form : Mammal

A cute monkey monster that loves bananas and dolls. It has been influenced by the dark magic of the Black Mage, which will cause Lupin to inadvertently cast magic attacks once in a while. It's apparently an extremely stubborn monster that will, once agitated, go after an adventurer and throw its bananas at them untill the very end. If you have high magic defenses, then you'll be able to protect yourself from the banana that Lupin may throw at you.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 35
Form : Plant

According to Winston, who has devoted a good chunk of his life to studying the plateaus of Perion, the Perion of ancient times was not a dry and barren land. Rather, he suggests that it was a place of bountiful forests which rivaled those of current Ellinia. The soil in Perion had been saturated with moisture and nutrients in the past, supporting the necessary conditions for huge plants like Stumpy to grow. However, present-day Perion has turned into a dry, arid land, and Stumpy, which can be considered a legacy of ancient Perion, now survives on what little moisture is left. Yerning for the ancient and lush forests of old, Stumpy will attack any adventurer who trespasses on his land.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 38
Form : Plant

An ancient cactus with its actual age undetermined. Believed to once have been the Protector of the desert by many residents of Ariant, most notably Muhamad, the recent severe drought has made Dio enraged, and it will now attack anyone on sight. Dio will become an aggressive monster when it sees a person with water. It is sometimes accompanied by desert sandstorms.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 35
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Poison Attribute Attacks.

The Evil Eye monster that lives out on land. Once in open land, unlike the dark and damp areas of the underground regions where the Evil Eye dwell, these monsters had to find a way to camouflage themselves. The Curse Eye is the evolved, camouflaged version of the Evil Eye. It has also become resistant to poison attacks.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 35
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire and Holy Attribute Attacks. Affected by Heal.

A ghost monster that was formed from the dark shadows of the subways and the dark forests of Magatia. It is a dead yet undead creature that wears a white cloth over its body while floating around the world. It is Undead, which makes it vulnerable to holy attribute attacks and strong against physical attacks.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 37
Form : Fish
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks.

A crab monster that appears in the sand near the shores of Florina Beach. Lorang's speed and high defense rate render this monster difficult to hunt, but since it lives by the water, it is vulnerable to attacks with the lightning attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 38
Form : Enchanted

Does rank determine prowess? Ever since a group of Bloctopus in Eos Tower put on a toy crown, they have become stronger and more powerful, earning them the name King Bloctopus. Some adventurers suspected that the toy crowns worn by these monsters were the source of their power, but... to their surprise, the toy crowns were nothing but a silly trinket. Then where do they derive their power? They are no different than regular Bloctopus aside from the crown... hence, the origination of their increased strength still remains a mystery.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 32
Form : Fish
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A monster that appears in the form of a fish near the water east of Aqua Road. It has a few notable features including the black area around its eyes and the round body covered in scales. The Mask Fish is not dangerous as long as it remains unprovoked.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 35
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks.

A cute little pixie that floats around wearing a red hat. When attacked, this monster uses its magic wand to summon small stars. Don't let this adorable pixie fool you, as it is not shy about boasting its strong resistance to attacks with sanctity attribute and high defense rate against magic.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 35
Form : Spirit

A monster that has a unique appearance which resembles a round ball. It can cast a number of magic spells, including ones that will weaken or temporarily disable its opponent's skills. A number of adventures have claimed that they were attacked by this monster while hunting Wild Boars, Evil Eyes and Curse Eyes, so keep that in mind and always remain alert if you hunt these creatures. Fortunately, this monster usually travels alone, so if you're of a certain level, you should be able to easily defeat this monster.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 35
Form : Enchanted

An enchantment has turned the octopus-shape blocks that made up parts of the Eos Tower into monsters. Due to their impressive ability to jump when chasing their enemies, they are amongst the monsters the adventurers passing by Eos Tower should avoid or approach with caution. According to Dr. Kim of Omega Sector, these monsters have similar structural composition to aliens, but take that claim with a grain of salt as he doesn't exactly have the best track record.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 37
Form : Enchanted

A pink toy airplane that appears around the outer walls of Eos Tower in Ludibrium. It is battery-operated, though not under anyone's control. The Propelly has caused many accidents while recklessly flying around, crashing into many passersby who travel through Eos Tower.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 38
Form : Enchanted

A blue toy airplane that appears near the outer walls at the bottom of Eos Tower in Ludibrium. It is the biggest and the heaviest of all toy airplanes. The Planey occasionally crashes into the passersby because it struggles to support its own weight.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 39
Form : Enchanted

A toy soldier popular amongst kids. It races around on its horse, creating an impact that can inflict serious damage in a collision. The Toy Trojan was created for the purpose of entertaining kids, but it has caused more accidents and harmed people with its reckless maneuvers ever since the Dimensional Schism.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 37
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Affected by Heal.

It once was a useful creature that told time, until the time stopped ticking in Ludibrium and all the wall clocks were thrown away. The force of darkness that emanated from the Dimensional Schism consumed the wall clocks, turning them into monsters controlled by a cursed windup spring. As this dark force still lingers, you can feel the cold air when you're near this Chronos.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 31
Form : Bird

A monster that appears in the form of a bird wearing a helmet and a pair of goggles. It pesters the adventurers who come to visit the upper exterior areas of Eos Tower. Some say that it is a run-away pet of someone in the Omega Sector, but no one knows to whom the Chirppy actually belongs.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 39
Form : Bird

A monster that appears in the form of a bird wearing a helmet and a pair of goggles. It pesters the adventurers who come to visit the lower exterior areas of Eos Tower. The pink mother Tweeter has the tendency to foolhardily attack due to its impulsive personality.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 30
Form : Enchanted

A toy rabbit monster spotted along the exterior walls of Eos Tower. It relentlessly beats on the marching drum hanging around its shoulders, even without a battery. This monster's battery was apparently used up a long time ago. According to Dr. Kim of Omega Sector, what powers them now is the energy from the dark crystals a few of them carry.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 38
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

Baby seal monsters whose genders are yet to be ascertained. They are popular amongst adventurers in Aqua Road, as their sparkling eyes and tiny little flippers are as endearing as can be. They may be cute baby seals now, but they develop into Freezers and Sparkers when they mature.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 42
Form : Enchanted

A mechanical apparatus built by the Alcadno alchemists in Magatia. It is mainly composed of steel, and serves as the foundational structure of all the mechanical apparatus that the alchemists in Alcadno build. Building an Iron Mutae is the first step for all novice Alcadno alchemists.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 45
Form : Enchanted

A mechanical apparatus built by the Alcadno alchemists in Magatia. While it is a modified Iron Mutae, it is still a fairly simple machine to build for the novice alchemists in Alcadno.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 47
Form : Enchanted

The Mithril Mutae is a mechanical machinery that offers more functions than the Iron Mutae and is mainly composed of mithril as opposed to steel. The person who has made this discovery is the president of Alcadno, Maed. Thanks to his experiments and research, many alchemists are now able to easily master the metal work process.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 45
Form : Reptile

A dragon monster that was banished from the Sleepywood dungeons. It is one of the weakest and the least intelligent of all dragons, making it closer to a monster than a dragon. But even so, it is a pretty powerful monster, no matter how weak of a dragon it may be. It lives in the mountainous highlands of Perion.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 46
Form : Reptile

A monster that appears in the form of a turtle near the sands of Florina Beach. Contrary to the preconditioned notions about turtles, Torties are rather speedy and can orally eject poisonous liquid. They have high attack and defense rates with no particular vulnerabilities, so these monsters are challenging to hunt.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 47
Form : Plant
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks.

A carnivorous plant which evolved from Nependeath. It remains in one place, so travelers who can use long-distance attacks should capitalize on its stationary state. However, note that it will attack anyone within its attack range without exception. Although a plant, it is not vulnerable to attacks of fire attribute due to its dark nature. Use attacks of the sanctity attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 47
Form : Enchanted

This monster is the reason why Dr. Kim of Omega Sector has come to question the relationship between alien and Bloctopus. A block golem being controlled by a Bloctopus resembles somewhat of an alien quality. The Rombot is covered in armoring, hence it has high defense rate. It will also pound the ground with its huge bock arms, which can send a shockwave through Eos Tower.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 45
Form : Fish

A gigantic clam that likes to hide. It is shy and reserved, but desires to satiate its vanity by coloring its shell with bright colors. It is not very fond of crowds, and will attack by bashing travelers with its shell and throwing its pearl when disturbed. A recent rumor has it that a prince picked up one of these pearls and led him to a windfall gain.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 40
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

There are rumors about Evil Eyes that live in the deepest depths of the dungeons of Sleepywood. In these dark caves where not a single ray of sunlight is able to enter, Evil Eyes started losing their color, turning more and more white over time. The magic aura emanating from the darkness of the abyss have also caused these Evil Eyes to transform into the more powerful Cold Eyes. Cold Eyes are spotted around other monsters that are of the Boss Level. A pocket of Cold Eyes is rumored to live inside a few large trees in Ellinia.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 40
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks. Affected by Heal

There was apparently a time when the Grand Magician Grendel had fallen down the wrong path. What could be worse than a great Magician falling for dark magic? A doll that was once cursed got into Lupin's hands and was reincarnated as the Zombie Lupin. Grendel and the fairies of Ellinia tried everything in their power to rid Ellinia of this monster but that one mistake made so long ago continues to have its effects on Ellinia. Zombie Lupin, an Undead monster that is being controlled by the cursed doll, is vulnerable to attacks with the sanctity attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 48
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks. Affected by Heal.

A ghost monster that was formed from the trenches of the dark shadows of the subways. This is the more advanced version of the Jr. Wraith that is dead yet undead. The Wraith wears a white cloth over its body while floating around the Kerning City subways. It is an Undead which makes it vulnerable to sanctity attribute attacks and strong against physical attacks. Unlike the Jr. Wraith, Wraith has the ability to self-recover.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 42
Form : Mammal

There are heroes even in the world of Pigs. Despite all the attacks being made on Pigs by humans and other animal opponents, some Pigs have survived, proving their heroic status. Calling themselves Iron Hogs, the shiny iron armor on these pigs symbolizes their undisputed heroic power. It actually doesn't have such high powered attacks, but has boss-level Physical Defenses and Magic Defenses, thanks to the iron-clad armor it dones.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 48
Form : Fish
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks.

A crab monster that mainly lives near the sand by the shores of Florina Beach. Clang is superior to Lorang in every aspect including speed and defense rate. It is encouraged that you don't attack this monster hastily, as it dashes along the seashore at the speed which rivals that of Lupin. But since it lives near the sea like Lorang, it is very vulnerable to lightning as a result. Try attacking this monster with the electricity attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 42
Form : Plant
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A carnivorous plant known to feed on animals and insects. It remains in one place, so travelers who can use long-distance attacks should capitalize on its stationary state. However, note that it will attack anyone within its attack range without exception. This plant monster is vulnerable to attacks of fire attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 45
Form : Spirit

A cute little pixie that floats around wearing a purple hat. When attacked, this monster will use its magic wand to summon a blue moon. Unlike Star Pixie, it does not have resistance to holy attribute attacks, although it has high defense rate against all forms of magic.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 41
Form : Mammal

A monster that appears in the form of a bat which lives in the abandoned mines in El Nath. It degenerated into a one-eyed monster with huge wings due to its life in the darkness, almost completely devoid of light. It flies around the abandoned mine, prepared to attack the adventurers at all times. A group of Flyeyes have also been recently discovered in a deep underwater cave near Aqua Road.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 43
Form : Mammal

A young Cerebus born inside the lava caves in El Nath. While yet to develop any formiddable strengths, it is still a relatively tough creature because of the environment it grows up in. Lately, the bandits of the Flaming Raccoon have been raising the Jr. Cerebus to become guard dogs for their hideout.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 42
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice and Lightning Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A group of Bloctopus that crossed through dimensions during the Temporal Schism were combined with mysterious blocks, transforming them into Block Golems. However, the combining process was not completely successful, so one can carefully break off and acquire block fragments from these creatures.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 45
Form : Enchanted

 A group of Bloctopus that crossed over the dimensions during the Temporal Schism were combined with mysterious blocks, transforming them into King Block Golems. This consolidated group of blocks emit a draft of threatening chilly air, which foreshadows impending danger.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 41
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire and Ice Attribute Attacks.

A toy robot manufactured in the toy factory in Ludibrium. It thrives on the mysterious force generated by the Dimensional Schism, giving it a strong battle prowess. It never ceases to move around.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 44
Form : Enchanted

A high-quality toy robot manufactured in the toy factory in Ludibrium. It thrives on the mysterious force generated by the Dimensional Schism, giving it a very strong battle prowess. It never ceases to move around, but one can control the Robos if he/she can manage to take control of this Master Robo.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 40
Form : Spirit

There are particular entities that linger the infinitude of the space-time continuum, where no ordinary creature can reach by ordinary means; Tick-Tock is one of them. Capitalizing on the Dimensional Schism, Tick-Tock can be found in the deserted Ludibrium Clocktower, feeding on time. Some researchers say the Tick-Tock is the full-grown form of Tick, but a dominant opinion suggests that these monsters cannot undergo the similar process of growth as regular orgnisms, given that they are creatures of fractured and enmeshed space-time.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 41
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Affected by Heal.

It once was a useful creature that told time, until the time stopped ticking in Ludibrium and all the wall clocks were thrown away. The force of darkness that emanated from the crack in the time and space contiuum consumed the wall clocks, turning them into monsters controlled by a cursed windup spring. As this dark force still lingers, you can feel the cold air when you're just near this monster. The Platoon Chronos are stronger than regular Chronos and can emit a powerful magic blast from their clocks.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 46
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Affected by Heal.

It once was a useful creature that told time, until the time stopped ticking in Ludibrium and all the wall clocks were thrown away. The force of darkness that loomed over the crack in the time and space contiuum consumed the wall clocks, turning them into monsters controlled by a cursed windup spring. As this force still lingers, one can feel the cold air when near this monster. The Master Chronos are the strongest of all Chronos and have the deepest-rooted hatred towards humans. They also can emit a powerful magic blast from their clocks.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 40
Form : Spirit

A group of Alien Grays that came to take over the world. Although they are generally weaker than the other Grays, the supernatural powers of the cunning Barnard Grays should not be ignored.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 42
Form : Spirit

A group of Alien Grays that came to take over the world. They have supernatural powers that surpass those of regular Grays, which allows them to fly. Hence, hunting them is not as easy. There is a rumor that their ability to fly comes from their cape. But if it's difficult to catch a flying Zeta Gray, snatching its cape would not be child's play either.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 45
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks.

These Grays are unique in that they did not come from another planet but were created here on Earth instead. They are the product of Grays who cloned themselves in the hopes of enhancing their abilities. Possessing the supernatural abilities of all Grays, the Ultra Grays use these powers to attack. Dr. Kim of Omega Sector, who claims to have communicated with the Ultra Grays, says that they are rather aloof and condescending.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 41
Form : Spirit

An army of low-ranking soldiers that came from Mateon to take over the world. Their laser guns are not very powerful, but their large numbers are a constant threat to the Omega Sector.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 44
Form : Spirit

An army of middle-ranking soldiers that came from Mateon to take over the world. The Plateon's mobility is enhanced, as they transport via a small but speedy UFO. They attack at a high speed, so the Omega Sector is on full alert.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 46
Form : Spirit

An army of Mateon soldiers that wear mechanical armor, which has led people to suspect that they are a special army squad. The effects of the Mecateon's mechanic armor have not yet been ascertained, but according to Dr. Kim's research, it is possible that their armor may allow them access to the Headquarters.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 43
Form : Mammal

Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire and Lightning Attribute Attacks.

A fully grown male seal monster that lives in the waters west of Aqua Road. It possesses electricity attribute and has a mark on its chest that signifies electricity. Sparkers do not usually travel together; they remain solitary to avoid reaching a dangerously high level of electricity flow. However, the recent pollution in the Aqua Road has altered their behavior. No one has discovered how the Jr. Seal becomes a Sparker.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 42
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire and Ice Attribute Attacks.

A fully grown female seal monster that lives in the water west of Aqua Road. It possesses ice attribute and has a mark on its chest that signifies ice. It has the tendency to mount its baby seal on its head, and researchers have discovered that a Jr. Seal can grow into a Freezer if it receives the force of coldness in El Nath.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 44
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks. Affected by Heal

The skeleton of a dog that has been brought to life by Ergoth's force of darkness. Some have claimed that it was once owned by the Sharenian army. It is the first Undead monster you will encounter in the Sharenian grave site.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 47
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks. Affected by Heal.

The mummified skeleton of a dog that has been brought to life by Ergoth's force of darkness. Some speculate that it was once owned by the Sharenian army. The embalmment of the Mummydog has made the animal very dirty over time.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 40
Form : Fish
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A fish monster that lives in the sea west of Aqua Road. It will scare its enemies away by puffing up. They live in clean water where no signs of contamination can be seen, but the population of Poopas is slowly decreasing, as the Aqua Road purification has weakened.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 40
Form : Fish
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire and Poison Attribute Attack.

A fish monster that lives in the sea west of Aqua Road. It is frequently seen under the sea, and will scare its enemies away by puffing up. The Poison Poopas are, indeed, poisonous which makes them more dangerous than regular Poopas.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 45
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A bunny that lives at the base of the Black Mountain located in Korean Folk Town. The people in the Town believe these creatures were milling on the moon, but then apparently have migrated for unknown reasons, thus naming them Moon Bunny. They carry around a pounder with them at all times, but it isn't used to do anything practical. Rather, they come at you with the pounder when they become angry, so it is suggested that you run away from them as quickly as possible.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 45
Form : Mammal

A high-ranking warrior boar of the highlands. The Iron Boars wear sturdy iron armor that is donned only by the chief even amongst the Iron Hogs. They come at you at a high speed and have high defense rate due to the iron armor they wear, making this monster a challenge for the adventurers to hunt.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 40
Form : Mammal

A type of chipmunk that lives only in the Sky Forest. They are bigger and smarter when compared to regular chipmunks. They have the tendency to move by rolling and balancing on an acorn. They do this because they are trying to flatten the outer layer to facilitate the peeling process to get to the core. They are generally mild-tempered, unless they are provoked, so be careful when you explore the Sky Forest.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 41
Form : Mammal

A type of porcupine with red fur that only lives in Sky Forest. A group of porcupines traveling through the underground of Maple World settled in the Sky Forest, and their population expanded due to the abundance of resources. Lately, however, these resources have begun to diminish and the Porkys are now battling against the Chipmunks over acorns.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 43
Form : Mammal

A type of porcupine that only lives in Sky Forest. The Black Porkies share the same physical features as the Red Porkies. However, they are stronger than the Red Porkies, which explains their notable contribution in the battle against the Chipmunks. Calling them a family of warrior porcupines would not be an overstatement.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 45
Form : Reptile

A type of Necki that lives only in the Sky Forest. It is as big as a regular Necki, but has vibrant colors and no poison. It wears a swim cap that is covered in flowers, but no one knows why the Blue Flower Serpent wears it in the forest. Neckis cannot swim in water, but it is yet to be discovered whether these swim-cap-wearing Blue Flower Serpents are an exception.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 45
Form : Reptile

A type of Necki that lives only in the Sky Forest. It is as big as a regular Necki, but has vibrant colors and no poison. The Red Flower Serpents like to travel with the Blue Flower Serpents. The flowers on their head are known to have a miraculous substance that can cure arthritis and MP shortages when used as medicinal herbs.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 47
Form : Enchanted

A jar that was once used to store medicinal herbs. This jar has been brought to life when an unknown monster entered inside, but no one has been able to identify the monster nor the effect it had on the jar. Captain Hwang of Herb Town has been dedicating a lot of time and energy to defeat this monster, but he has not been very successful. The Jar can be found in the fields near Herb Town.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 48
Form : Enchanted

The Ginseng Jar was once a simple jar used to detoct an aged ginseng herb. However, the ginseng, which thoroughly enjoyed the hot bath, talked the innocent jar into escaping the Herb Town. During this time, the jar somehow was consumed by a mysterious force that turned it into a monster.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 40
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire and Ice Attribute Attacks.

A creature that lives only in the desert. It is composed of sand, and has a hobby of deceiving people to believe that it is an oasis, then scaring them. Although not frequent, some have said that the Desert Giants do sometimes transform into an oasis; hence, you shouldn't defeat them in a rash manner.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 49
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Damage from All Elemental Attributes.

The highest ranking Gray. The Chief Gray oversees all Grays but can rarely be seen, as it usually hides amongst groups of Grays. The Chief Gray is wise and powerful, and it exercises various supernatural powers. It occasionally summons Grays when necessary.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 50
Form : Mammal

Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks

A small yeti often spotted in the snowfield of Ossyria near El Nath. It is made to live in cold climates and can therefore withstand strong Ice Attribute Attacks while being vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks. Its small frame and slow movement makes it an easy target, but beware, as many a travellers have been badly injured by this cute little creature. The Jr. Yeti is capable of transforming into a giant yeti as well, so watch out!

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 51
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A ball of fire that is primarily found in the Lava Dungeon in El Nath, but has also been seen deep inside the MesoGears and The Secret Spa in Showa Town. No one knows for what purpose it was created, but it attacks by self-exploding when in danger. Some adventurers speculate that the Firebomb is a follower of Zakum. It is highly resistant to attacks of fire attribute but vulnerable to attacks of ice attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 50
Form : Mammal

A large tiger cub found along the mountainside of the Black Mountain. It skips around cheerfully, but it is still a tiger, which means it can turn fierce and predatory and catch you off guard. Occasionally, you can earn a paw-print stamp when you defeat the Hodori.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 56
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire and Holy Attribute Attacks.

A Three-Tailed Fox that can be found near the Korean Folk Town. It is striving to become a Nine-Tailed Fox, but only has three tails as it is still in the process of training. It has taken over an entire valley of the Black Mountain, practicing magic by casting curses on the passersby; hence, the adventurers exploring the Fox Ridge should always remain alert and cautious. A group of Samiho have also been spotted outside the Mushroom Shrine.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 53
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A tiger found near the Korean Folk Town. This seems to be what a full-grown Hodori would become. Unlike the threatening firm-build it sports, the Hogul is rather cautious when approaching the adventurers. It used to be intrepid until Ludibrium was turned upside down due to the Temporal Schism.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 50
Form : Enchanted

A form of Mithril enhanced and reinforced by mixing other metals to rival the powerful strength of Orihalcon, rendering it more powerful than regular Mithril Mutae.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 54
Form : Enchanted

A robot-like creature built by the alchemists in Magatia. The Roid was the Alcadno's first attempt at replicating human life, thus the creature has a slight resemblance to a humanoid figure. It is small but has the power that will exceed your expectations, and also has an intricate internal structure.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 58
Form : Enchanted

A robot built by the alchemists in Magatia. The Neo Huroid was Alcadno's second attempt to replicate human life, and the lessons learned from the Roid experiment has made this creature resemble a humanoid more closely. It is small but has the power that will exceed your expectations, and also has an extremely intricate internal structure. It is powered by the purple energy stone it is attached to.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 52
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Attacks of All Elemental Attributes.

A cute little pixie that floats around wearing a black hat. When attacked, this monster, which evolved from Lunar Pixie, uses its magic wand to summon a blazing sun. Unlike the Star Pixie and the Lunar Pixie, the Luster Pixie has no elemental weakness you can attack, and is highly resistant to attacks with fire, ice, electricity, and sanctity attributes. It is, however, relatively vulnerable to physical attacks, so use powerful weapons to defeat this monster.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 53
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

The form that a full grown Jr. Cellion takes. It can be found in the Garden of Red in Orbis, and this mature Cellion concentrates all of its fire attribute into the horn on its head to attack. It has fire attribute that allows this monster to be highly resistant to attacks of fire attribute. Let's try defeating the Cellion using attacks of ice attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 53
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Lightning Attribute Attack. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

The form that a full grown Jr. Lioner takes. It can be found in the Garden of Yellow in Orbis, and this mature Lioner concentrates all of its lightning attribute into the horn on its head to attack. This monster is highly resistant to attacks of lightning attribute. Let's try defeating the Lioner using attacks of ice attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 53
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

The form that a full grown Jr. Grupin takes. It can be found in the Garden of Green in Orbis, and this mature Grupin, which changes from purple to blue, charges all of its ice attribute into the horn on its head to attack. This monster is highly resistant to attacks of ice attribute. Let's try defeating the Grupin using attacks of fire attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 54
Form : Enchanted

A powerful weapon secretly built by the Mateon aliens to attack the Earth. It has been built to support the small and weak Mateons, and it is equipped with multiple explosive missiles. The Omega Sector has sent over a special troop to battle against MT-09. The fuel used to power the MT-09 is very potent, and Kay of Omega Sector is actively researching the fuel in the hopes of discovering a way to utilize it against the Mateon Army.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 56
Form : Mammal

A type of bear that lives near Mu Lung. Although it's only a bear, it has a heartfelt desire to become a virtuous master, hence devoting much of its energy in training. While it diligently trains in its practice uniform, it sometimes fails to suppress its animalistic instinct and attacks the passersby.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 53
Form : Plant

A plant that closely resembles a ginseng, although its medicinal effects fall way below. A group of Bellflower Roots keep intruding into the ginseng fields and herb gardens, absorbing all of the nutrients in the soil, which upsets Mr. Ku of Herb Town. The Bellflower Roots discovered Mr. Ku's ginseng field when they were looking for a new habitat since the abduction of their Prince, Wu Yang. Seeing how they've become pretty comfortable in the field, it is suspected and assumed that the Bellflower Roots will continue to be a pain in Mr. Ku's neck for a while longer.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 54
Form : Plant

A plant that closely resembles a ginseng. Although Bellflower Roots have been said to fall way below in medicinal effects compared to ginseng, the Sr. Bellflower Root can be even more effective than ginseng at times. It may look weak and weary, making you feel guilty about hunting this monster, but take advantage of its use as a medicinal herb. After all, it's only a Bellflower Root.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 50
Form : Enchanted

An enchanted straw target dummy that a swordsmith in Mu Lung made for those training to become legendary wizards. The trainees should never be found apart from this dummy if they sincerely desire to become legendary wizards, as most of their time must be spent training with it. This dummy has become a comical figure due to the childish doodling on its face for which the trainees are responsible.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 51
Form : Enchanted

An enchanted wooden target dummy that a swordsmith in Mu Lung made for those training to become virtuous masters. The trainees should never be found apart from this dummy if they sincerely desire to become legendary masters, as most of their time must be spent training with it. This dummy has become a comical figure due to the childish doodling on its face for which the trainees are responsible.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 58
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A deer that feeds on peaches at the Peach Farm. Due to the effects of its diet, the Reindeer boasts high intelligence which allows it to use powerful magic. There is a rumor that a Reindeer's antler in perfect condition can enhance one's ascetical powers, but it is extremely difficult to acquire an antler from a Reindeer in perfect condition without breaking it.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 55
Form : Spirit

A precious documentation that reveals the principles of nature and the universe written by an ascetic of the olden times. The Book Ghost was brought to life by a mysterious force originating from the profound truths contained within the book and the ascetic's magic embodied the book. Some say that becoming an adept in this book can grant one power and strength, but the Book Ghost will attack anyone who is not qualified to be its master.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 50
Form : Reptile

A scary dragon type monster that hunts down adventurers who traverse the deep Sleepywood Dungeon. One of its shortcomings, though, is its low-level IQ which makes it not quite worthy of being called a dragon per-se. Despite its slightly thickheaded appearance, its cohorts tend to go around in herds which makes being surrounded by a group of them a highly risky situation. Your run-of-the-mill adventurer will find oneself putting up his or her own tombstone if not extremely careful!

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 55
Form : Enchanted

A bunch of stones that have been enchanted by a forest spirit. It is the protector of the forest from which it was born, and will never launch an attack at an adventurer without provocation. But if you've indiscriminately entered into the forest without permission, you may be at the mercy of the Stone Golem's formiddable attack, so be careful.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 58
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks.

A Stone Golem monster which had been infected with the evil aura that had permeated from the the depths of the forest, leaving the forest in ruins and annihilating some of the Stone Golems that were guarding the Stone Golem's Temple. The Dark Stone Golems who had inadvertently caused a detrimental effect on the Temple decided to finish their duties by going deep into Sleepywood. But it is said that some Dark Stone Golems still remain in the Golem's Temple.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 52
Form : Reptile

A crocodile monster that lives in the swampy regions outside Kerning City. Compared to the Ligator, the Croco has a much stronger attack and a thicker hide. It is popular amongst the hunters who are after its sturdy and prized skin.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 55
Form : Mammal

A monster that appears in the form of a wolf near El Nath. It is a popular target amongst the hunters who are after its thick coat, which facilitates the Hector's survival in the cold weather of El Nath. When attacked, Hectors attack using magic of multiplicity, so it is highly encouraged that you quickly step back when you find yourself in a dangerous encounter with this monster.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 56
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks.

A yeti often spotted in the canyons and mountains far away from El Nath. They say that the Dark Jr. Yeti is the evil form of the Jr. Yeti and is more advanced in terms of attack powers, defense strength, etc. It is also made of completely different attributes which makes it particularly vulnerable to forces of Sanctity.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 57
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks. Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks. Affected by Heal.

Undead monsters that can be found in the Forest of Dead Trees near the top of the mountains in El Nath. When Riche's Tomb created the Forest of Dead Trees, the trees in the forest bewitched lifeless beings from a long-forgotten cemetery, reanimating them as zombies. Because the Coolie Zombies became zombies to protect the forest against their will, they possess nothing but hostility and hatred towards humans. These monsters, who walk with a severe limp and are missing one eye, are the followers of Riche and are dangerous. They can orally spit a potent poison and can channel dark magic through their decaying hands.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 57
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks. Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks. Affected by Heal.

Undead monsters that can be found in the Dead Mines inside the mountains of El Nath. When Riche's Tomb formed the Forest of Dead Trees, the trees in the forest bewitched the bodies of the lifeless miners who lost their lives ages ago while hunting for gold, reanimating them as zombies. Whether it was due to those ancient mining accidents or simply a mutation, the Miner Zombies have a severe limp and are nearly blind eye on one side. A few of these zombies still hold on to the gold they once found while mining ages ago, which can be found in the form of gold teeth. These golden teeth have supernatural magic that connects them to Zakum, likely through the greedy and selfish desires the ancient miners had when alive.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 58
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A monster that appears in the form of a wolf near El Nath. It is a popular target amongst the hunters who are after its thick coat, which facilitates the White Fang's survival in the cold weather of El Nath. Its white fur blends in with the surrounding snowfields, making this monster more difficult for hunters to spot than a Hector, not to mention its high attack rate and resistance to attacks of ice attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 59
Form : Enchanted

The remaining fragments of Stone Golems and Dark Stone Golems have formed this mutation, which possesses the characteristics of both golems; hence, it has even higher attack rate than regular golems. It can be found in dungeons as well as the deserted Golem's Temple, guarding the temple even after its rebirth.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 57
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks. Affected by Heal.

The skeleton of a soldier that was brought to life by Ergoth's force of darkness. It once was a Sharenian guard, but died during the fall of the Sharenian empire and was revived without a soul.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 23
Form : Enchanted

A round mechanical apparatus that is frequently seen in the tower near Orbis. It floats in the air and uses melee attacks. Some have said the Jr. Sentinels were built for the purpose of guarding the tower, but it has not been confirmed.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 30
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A round mechanical apparatus that is frequently seen in the tower near Orbis. Some have said the Ice Sentinels were built for the purpose of guarding the tower, but this has not been confirmed. It has a firm outer layer comprised of stone, and has the ability to quickly separate to shoot a laser when attacked. It is highly resistant to attacks of ice attribute, but vulnerable to attacks of fire attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 30
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A round mechanical apparatus that is frequently seen in the tower near Orbis. Some have said the Fire Sentinels were built for the purpose of guarding the tower, but this has not been confirmed. It has a firm outer layer comprised of stone, and has the ability to quickly separate to shoot a laser when attacked. It is highly resistant to attacks of fire attribute, but vulnerable to attacks of ice attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 55
Form : Fish

A beautiful blue-shelled crab that has migrated to Florina Beach from the Tropics. It enjoys basking in the sunlight along the Florina shoreline. It usually hides inside its shell until someone awakens it by tapping on its shell and disturbing its sunbath. King Clang is a dangerous opponent and when attacked by its pincers, which usually remain hidden inside the shell, one will become temporarily immobile.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 50
Form : Immortal

The darkness deep inside Ellinia has endowed this monster with a powerful evil spirit, and this evil spirit uses its magic powers to control the Zombie Lupin like a puppet. It has also consumed the seed of magic of darkness that Grendel the Really Old once accidentally dropped and lost, greatly increasing its size and strength far beyond that of a normal Zombie Lupin. Faust now strives to maintain the darkness of Ellinia Forest.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 59
Form : Enchanted

A ghost of the past that originated from the deserted land in Ludibrium. It was brought back to life due to the Dimensional Schism, and has been a follower of Papulatus ever since, pestering anyone that attempts to go near the lower levels of the Clocktower. It appears in the form of an owl clock, and it tries to cling on to the past by attempting to turn back time.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 32
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A monster that was created by the snow and dust in El Nath, usually found in the lower levels of the Orbis Tower and the field of El Nath. It is a white fur ball, light as a feather that can drift with the current of the wind.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 33
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks.

A monster that was created by the snow and dust in El Nath, blackened due to the corrupted dirt and ash from in the tower. It is as light as a feather that can drift with the current of the wind.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 55
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks.

Monsters that have turned evil due to the magic of darkness they have inherited from the demons. They are experimenting in forbidden magic, and can be seen riding their flying brooms around the deep forest to gather materials for their experiments. They are vulnerable to attacks of sanctity attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 35
Form : Animal
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A small penguin that appears in and near El Nath where the temperature is low. When you encounter Jr. Pepes, you can safely assume that you are almost in El Nath. They are highly adaptable to different conditions, although an appropriate temperature is a must for them. The Jr. Pepes, who have already adjusted to the snowfield of El Nath, move at a high speed even on ice so it is difficult to avoid them.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 65
Form : Enchanted

It is neither an animal nor a plant. This strange form of life, created inside a beaker by the alchemists of Zenumist, is muggy gray, perhaps due to the mixture of chemicals. It likes to roam around with a beaker over its head.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 68
Form : Immortal

Special Trait : Affected by Heal

Old alchemist bachelors in Magatia who devoted their entire lives to research without setting any personal time aside become this monster after life. With their research never completed, they are sullen and irritable, and have the tendency to angrily throw beakers at anyone they see.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 60
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A dragon that lives in the mountainous desert highlands of Perion. It is from a weak breed of dragons with low intelligence as compared to others in the dragon family of monsters. The Red Drake used to have its nest in Sleepywood, but was banished by the other dragons due to its weaknesses.
