It has since been training in the desert highlands, adjusting to the heat of the sun and practicing launching powerful fireballs into the far distance. There aren't very many adventurers who will be able to successfully hunt this fireball-spitting dragon known as Red Drake.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 60
Form : Plant

A gigantic mushroom. This monster is the mother figure to all mushrooms, and it has been said that a huge number of mushrooms across Victoria Island spored from the Mushmom. Although this is a dangerous monster that can shake the ground with a simple jump, some researchers claim that the Mushmom must be preserved as it plays a major role in the ecosystem. Mushmom has recently been found in a hidden area near Henesys with other small mushrooms.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 60
Form : Animal
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A penguin monster that is occasionally found in the snowfield far from El Nath. It wears a golden crown, and can move with finesse even on ice as it has adapted to icy snowfield surroundings. It can move faster than any other creature that inhabits the snowfield, so you should always be on the lookout should this monster begin to attack. Its dashing speed and subsequent attack render Pepe a difficult monster to avoid. Pepes have a very close relationship with the Yetis, which explains why Yetis are occasionally found with a Pepe mounted on their heads, although no one has discovered why this phenomenon was started.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 61
Form : Devil

The spirit of a young time stopper who worked at the Clocktower in Ludibrium in the past. It was mild-tempered before the force of time consumed its spirit. Since then, contrary to what its jester's hat may deceivingly illustrate, it has become hostile and attacks people using the force of entangled time while roaming around deep inside the Clocktower.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 60
Form : Devil
Special Trait : 1st Form: Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice and Holy Attribute Attacks.
2nd Form: Resistant (-50%) to Fire and Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks.

A blue globe of fire that appears near the summit of the Black Mountain. It floats in the air and scares the passersby. When the fire is attacked, the Morphed Blin reveals its true self, which resembles a block of brick. Rather than a type of goblin, as some believe this creature is, it might be more accurate to say this monster is closer to an evil spirit that lives in the Black Mountain.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 60
Form : Mammal

A type of bear that lives near Mu Lung. Although it is just a bear, it sincerely desires to become a virtuous master; hence, it is always wearing its training uniform, completely immersed in training. It has features similar to those of humans, but no one knows whether that is because it is close to becoming a virtuous master or because that's just one of this monster's special traits.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 64
Form : Reptile

A monster alligator that lives in the swampy regions near Herb Town. It enjoys the company of small animals, so it is often seen carrying a little bird on its head and a baby Bellflower Root on its back. Mr. Ali does not attack unless provoked, but it turns into a ferocious monster when attacked.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 62
Form : Mammal

A monkey that feeds on peaches at the Peach Farm. The Peach Monkeys have a pink coat of fur due to their diet of peaches, but these monkeys rival, if not surpass, the intelligence level of some humans. At first, the Peach Monkeys helped spread the seeds to expand the Peach Farm, but because of the gradual growth of their population, they have actually begun to harm the farm.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 68
Form : Devil

An unknown figure that serves Lord Pirate. It has accompanied Lord Pirate on his many raids across the sea, pillaging the people and their treasure. Lately, it spends most of its energy pestering the Bellflower Roots under the command of Lord Pirate.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 66
Form : Mammal

A cat that somehow got its hands on the book of Toist magic. It now self-proclaims that it is a Sage Cat after having mastered the skills in the book. Because it did not go through the proper, extensive training of becoming a virtuous master, it is rather antagonistic and violent by nature. You must be careful of this catty monster which has the tendency to scratch its enemy, as it has gained an expertise on powerful magic attacks.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 65
Form : Reptile

A gigantic crocodile that hides in the deep swamps outside Kerning City. Some say that it suddenly grew in size due to a strange substance discarded in the Kerning City waste water, which it then consumed. Although such a claim has not been confirmed, it is being investigated by JM From tha Streetz. Despite its gigantic size, Dyle is naturally docile. It has become a menace lately because it has befriended Birdy, the bird that has made its nest on Dyle's back. The bird dangles a tasty fish in front of Dyle, enticing him to create havoc against anyone who traverses through the deep swamp.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 65
Form : Spirit

A type of humanoid built with the newest technology developed by the Grays, who are conspiring to take over the Omega Sector. Designed with only the best qualities of a robot and a Gray, Zeno supplements the battle prowess the Barnards and Zetas lack. However, its intelligence level is sub par due to a malfunction which occurred during the testing process. This malfunction has worried even the Grays, because they are unsure if they would be able to stop him should he malfunction any further, perhaps even attack them!

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 62
Form : Reptile

A monster with lots of contending rumors behind its origin, such as the one that claims that the Wild Kargo was once the pet cat of the ancient devil Balrog and the rumor that it was a cat that was left behind by some adventurer while exploring the dungeon. These rumors were recently debunked when one very courageous scholar who went around to get to the truth of this supposed cat and discovered that the Wild Kargo is in fact a reptile, not a cat. Its eyes, however, look so much like a cat's that everyone agrees that more research is required to get to the truth of this monster. It is one of the most powerful monsters that one will meet in Sleepywood.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 64
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks.

A penguin monster often spotted in the canyons and cliffs far away from El Nath. Dark Pepe is a transformed form of Pepe that's been endowed with evil powers. It is an advanced monster with more powerful attacks and defenses compared to its original form as Pepe. One thing that hasn't been changed is the characteristically fast speed of Pepe. Dark Pepe is vulnerable to forces of Sanctity.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 66
Form : Devil

The spirit of a time stopper who used to work at the Clocktower in Ludibrium in the past. It was mild-tempered before the force of time consumed its spirit. Since then, contrary to what its jester's hat may deceivingly illustrate, it has become hostile and attacks people using the force of entangled time while floating around deep inside the Clocktower. Lazy Buffy is more formiddable than its green counterpart, and the beautiful marble at the end of its hat can fetch a handsome price from the right collector.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 63
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice and Lightning Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) Holy Attribute Attacks. Affected by Heal

A teddy bear that was brought to life by the commands of cursed spirits during the Dimensional Schism. Said curse has consumed the coziness and warmth this teddy bear once possessed, only leaving an eternal grudge against humans, which serves as the Soul Teddy's source of hatred and subsequent attack.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 63
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks. Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A black monster that lives in the Stairway to the Sky in Orbis. Although it resembles the physical characteristics of Cellion, Lioner, and Grupin, the Jr. Lucida has a pair of wings, not to mention the dark and brutal force that is reflected in its black coat of fur. When fully grown, Jr. Lucida becomes Lucida.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 67
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks. Immune to Ice Attribute Attacks. Affected by Heal.

A teddy bear that was brought to life by the commands of cursed spirits during the Dimensional Schism. Said curse has consumed the coziness and warmth this teddy bear once possessed, only leaving an eternal grudge against humans which serves as its source of hatred and subsequent attack. The Master Soul Teddy harbors the deepest grievance and resentment than any other teddy bears, hence it was endowed with the most powerful force of damnation.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 64
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A monster dragon that lives deep in the Sleepywood dungeon. When compared to regular family of dragons, the Ice Drake is weaker and has a lower level of intelligence. However, it has acquired an ice attribute while adapting to the coldness of the deep dungeon, and you can become a block of ice when attacked by this monster. Even its bones are comprised of ice, therefore its attack of ice attribute could inflict significant damage.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 68
Form : Reptile

A dragon monster that lives in the depths of dungeons. It is from a weak and low intelligence breed of dragons as compared to regular dragons of that family of monsters. The Dark Drake was endowed with an evil force from the cursed Temple and has grown a rather thick skin on its body. Its ferocity in the darkness of the dungeon is uncontested.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 63
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks. Affected by Heal.

The skeleton of a Sharenian officer devoid of spirit. After the fall of the Sharenian empire, Ergoth has revived the Skeleton Officer and endowed it with the force of darkness.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 65
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A gigantic snowman that appears in the snowfield far from El Nath. Although its speed of movement may seem sluggish, the power it illustrates when forcefully striking its two large fists on the ground can inflict significant damage. Due to its thick coat of fur, it manages well in the cold but can't stand heat. This fundamentally mild-natured monster sometimes roams around with its close friend Pepe mounted on its back. It is a pet in popular demand, as it is loyal and obedient when raised by a human from a young age.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 65
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Affected by Heal

A mother figure to all Zombie Mushrooms. The Zombie Mushmom harbors a powerful force of darkness; the charm it possesses, which turned the Mushmom into an even more powerful monster, is believed to be the source of its power. It is occasionally found deep inside the Ant Tunnel, shaking the caverns by jumping up and throwing its heavy body down to the ground, scaring the adventurers exploring the underground dungeon.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 74
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

These are what became of the people who worked the operation room of the Clocktower in Ludibrium when the Dimensional Schism occurred. The souls of these workers were consumed by the force of darkness, turning them into Buffoons of time. They attack the lost adventurers with the huge grandfather wall clock they carry, which was once used to keep time at the Clocktower.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 68
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks.

A gigantic snowman that appears in the snowfield far from El Nath. This mutant Yeti has been consumed by an evil force and is faster, stronger, and superior to the mild-natured Yeti in every aspect. It has also maintained the Yeti's signature fists that can inflict major damage, making this monster all the more dangerous. Try attacking this monster using sanctity attribute magic, as its attributes have completely changed and is now vulnerable to the force of sanctity.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 77
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

These are what became of the people who who worked the operation room of the Clocktower in Ludibrium during the Dimensional Schism. The souls of these workers were consumed by the force of darkness, turning them into Buffoons of time. They attack the lost adventurers with the huge grandfather wall clock they carry, which was used to keep time at the Clocktower. Every time the Deep Buffoons slam their grandfather wall clocks, time itself is penetrated and fractured.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 75
Form : Enchanted

This creature was Alcadno's third attempt to replicate human life through Alchemy. The D. Roy was the name given to the modified version of a pre-existing mechanical apparatus of Neo Huroid. Through the creation of D. Roy, the alchemists of Alcadno have built an improved Roid which self-charges. It is more independently operated as alchemists had wished, but now they seem to be struggling with a new problem; the D. Roy is hard to control, which makes its maintenance and repair that much more difficult.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 73
Form : Enchanted

It is neither an animal or a plant. These strange forms of life co-exist although they are completely independent of each other, unlike the relationship that a crocodile and a plover bird share. The Zenumist alchemists seemed to have created these mysterious creatures so they can study a co-independent couple of organisms that are of one entity.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 73
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks. Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks.

Creatures living on the Stairway to the Sky, the Lucida seems to resemble a black-furred devil. At first glance, it may look a lot like monsters made of Sanctity Attributes, such as Cellion, Lioner and Grupin, but Lucida is unaffected by Poison Attacks, although it is vulnerable to Sanctity Attacks. Lucida eminates such a strong aura that going near it seems to create sensations of evil right away, so be careful not to go hunting for Lucida without being amply prepared! It is a wonder if Lucida has always been so evil, though...

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 72
Form : Mammal

A monster born from the ocean of lava in the caves deep beneath the El Nath mountains. With its reddish eyes, monstrous teeth and spiky collar, Cerebes appears quite threatening. However, because it is not fully evolved, it can only use melee attacks. When Cerebes evolves into Bain, however, it will use powerful attacks of fire attribute, so beware.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 72
Form : Insect
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks.

A big beetle that lives in Minar Forest, where trees and leaves are abundant. It is protected by a thick outer layer that minimizes the external impact, and the sizable horn it sports on its head can toss any threatening enemy far away.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 76
Form : Insect
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks.

A big beetle that lives in Minar Forest which acquired a steel-like firm, silver outer layer when it underwent ecdysis. It threatens its enemies with even more powerful attacks than a regular Beetle.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 78
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire and Poison Attribute Attacks.

A group of spirits resembling Satyrs that live in Minar Forest. Unlike their rugged appearance, their personality is rather bubbly and cheerful. They have the ability to out-jump a human by about 1.5 times, which allows them to distract the adventurers by bouncing around. Although they are said to have a different colored eye on each side, it is hard to tell because of their tiny pupils. They cannot carry a tune even if their lives depended on it, so when you hear Hankie screaming, you will undergo a temporary stun status.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 85
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire and Holy Attribute Attacks. Affected by Heal.

A teddy bear that was brought to life by the commands of cursed spirits during the Dimensional Schism. Said curse has consumed the coziness and warmth this teddy bear once possessed, only leaving an eternal grudge against humans which serves as the Death Teddy's source of hatred and subsequent attack. The original form of the teddy has been consumed and distorted by the evil force, leaving only the creature that controls the teddy as its only recognizable physical feature.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 85
Form : Fish
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A fish monster that lives in the deep waters of Aqua Road. It used to fear just about everything, which explains its notable tendency to hide in its comfort zone. However, since the weakening of the purifying force of Aqua Road, even the young gobies have turned violent. A school of these quick Gobies will swarm and attack any intruders who wreck their habitat.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 70
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks.

An intimidating monster that guards the Sanctuary in the deepest areas of the Sleepywood Dungeon. It is a warrior that has the head of an ox and the body of a human, and uses a crescent-shaped spear etched with ancient runes to generate a lightning strike to destroy everything nearby. It dashes towards its enemy at a high speed with its lethal lightning attack, so you should never hastily approach this monster. It blocks the naive travellers from entering the cursed Sanctuary. It is said that Tauromacis serves as an usher to the Sanctuary to pay for its past crime. However it remains unknown what crime it committed and from whom the punishment is coming from.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 75
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire and Lightning Attribute Attacks. Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks

An intimidating monster that guards the Sanctuary in the deepest areas of the Sleepywood Dungeon. It dashes towards the adventurers with a huge spear, and has extremely high defense and attack rate. Furthermore, it moves at an impressively high speed, which renders this monster a bigger challenge than the Jr. Balrog to some adventurers. It guards the entrance of the cursed Sanctuary to prevent adventurers from entering. Although there is a rumor that the Taurospear became a gate keeper to the Sanctuary as a punishment for a crime it has committed, no one knows what the crime was or by whom this monster is being punished.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 78
Form : Animal
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

An odd couple found in the snowfield far from El Nath. Even a serious adventurer would find Yeti and Pepe strange yet hilarious, as they nonchalantly roam the snowfield. Many researchers have sought to discover the origination of this phenomenon for a number of years, but no one has found any evidential basis that can support this anomaly. In any case, the phrase 'as close as Yeti and Pepe' was coined based on what people have witnessed.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 73
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks. Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks. Affected by Heal.

The skeleton of a Sharenian commander which was brought to life by Ergoth's force of darkness. After the fall of the Sharenian empire, the skeleton of the commander was revived, along with its horse, both devoid of their souls.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 70
Form : Devil

An unidentifiable monster who serves Lord Pirate. It is one rank superior to Kru, and contributes to pillaging the humans while sailing the sea. Lately, it spends most of its energy pestering the Bellflower Roots under the command of Lord Pirate.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 75
Form : Mammal

A monster that appears in the form of a large wolf in the very deep end of the valley in the snowfield. It walks on two feet like a human, but attacks with sharp claws that remain hidden until provoked. There is a rumor that a person who gets bitten by this monster turns into a Werewolf.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 89
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice and Lightning Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks. Affected by Heal.

A teddy bear that was brought to life by the commands of cursed spirits during the Dimensional Schism. Said curse has consumed the coziness and warmth this teddy bear once possessed, only leaving an eternal grudge against humans which serves as the Master Death Teddy's source of hatred and subsequent attack. The Master Death Teddy, having lost most of its physical characteristics of a teddy bear, exudes a powerful evil aura. The chain around the teddy has turned gold, signifying that the teddy has lost all of its original traits and has become an empty shell and a stray of time.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 70
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A King Goblin known to fear just about everything including loud noise. It has even lost its goblin bat when the noise of a cracking hazelnut scared it away. Although a coward, it can burn everything in flames using its big goblin bat. It loves roasted pork.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 70
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%)to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A King Goblin known for its amnesia that results in forgetting and losing just about everything. It will often lose its hat. Although a forgetful goblin, it can freeze everything around it by using its big goblin bat. It loves rice wine.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 70
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A King Goblin known for its penchant for wrestling. It frequently pleads with the passersby for a wrestling match. It can fumigate everything nearby with its infamous flatulence. It loves buckwheat jelly.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 70
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A fuzzy spirit that lives only in Minar Forest. It cannot be found elsewhere, as it only lives in an area where no signs of contamination can be seen. Many adventurers are fooled by its fuzzy fur and adorable appearance, but it is covered in dust which has anesthetic effects.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 74
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A fuzzy spirit that lives only in Minar Forest. Unlike Rash, it can be found in contaminated areas as well. The Dark Rash is even more harmful and dangerous than the regular Rash, as its body is covered in dust that has poisonous effects.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 72
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A spirit that resembles a goblin that lives in Minar Forest. It has an ugly face but even an uglier personality, so you must be cautious when approaching this monster. It steals from people, but cannot figure out how or for what the belongings are used. It is always in raggedy clothes, and an unconfirmed rumor has it that Hobi was banished from the town after committing a crime that turned this monster into an ugly, heinous creature.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 76
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A spirit that resembles a goblin that lives in Minar Forest. As the lead warrior of the Hobis, the Green Hobi is in a more fashionable attire, though not by much. Although it displays battle prowess, handling objects isn't a forte for this monster, much like a regular Hobi. The Hafrings despise this monster, for it likes to attack their town and steal whatever it can get its hands on.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 83
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

There are particular entities that linger the infinitude of the space-time continuum, where no ordinary creature can reach by ordinary means; Ghost Pirate is one of them. The Ghost Pirate rides a flying boat that has a huge clock, allowing this monster to find its way even through the Temporal Schism and pillage the lost adventurers. It is said that the Ghost Pirate is highly resistant to attacks of coldness attribute although it is terrified of fire attacks, for fire could easily burn its ship.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 87
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

There are particular entities that linger the infinitude of the space-time continuum, where no ordinary creature can reach by ordinary means; Dual Ghost Pirate is one of them. The Dual Ghost Pirate rides a flying boat that has a huge clock, allowing this monster to find its ways even through the Temporal Schism and pillage the lost adventurers. As one of the stronger pirate monsters, its ship has a powerful propeller that can penetrate the gap in time. Although highly resistant against attacks of coldness attribute, it fears fire, for fire can easily burn its ship.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 71
Form : Mammal

Once No Gong's most promising apprentice, Tae Roon trained to become a virtuous master, until it became corrupted by the magic spell of the King Sage Cat, which caused it to harm a lot of people. Since then, it has chosen the path of penance, although it will still occasionally harm people due to the lingering spell. Its physical strength and magic render this monster a difficult enemy to defeat.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 70
Form : Mammal

A Three-Tailed Fox that transformed into a Nine-Tailed Fox through its extensive training with magic. Its fur is a silverish, moon-like color, and this fox monster can be found in the Fox Ridge of Black Mountain, waiting to prey on the lives in Korean Folk Town. It has sharp claws, powerful magic skills, and Three-Tailed-Foxes that serve as subordinates, which all render this monster a challenging enemy to defeat. However, the most dangerous quality of this monster comes from its cunningness that can easily deceive people. It likes to seduce people by disguising itself as a beautiful maiden, so be cautious when you come across an attractive lady at the foot of the Black Mountain.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 77
Form : Animal

A wicked monster that lives deep in the Goblin Forest. Taking the form of a large Sage Cat, it secretly mastered the magic that Mu Lung's trainees were studying in order to become a virtuous master. It considers Do Gong, who instructs trainees in mental training in Mu Lung, as its arch-nemesis. It dazzles the humans with its eloquence while riding a giant cloud, but remember that this Priest Cat is Master Goblin in disguise.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 80
Form : Enchanted

A strange form of life created by the Alchemists of Zenumist. Created in a beaker, it eventually become independently mobile. It was intended to be a project of creating a life form mainly consisting of soil based on the force of nature, but an accidental drop of blood resulted in this mysterious, unidentifiable creature. It began its life as one creature before undergoing a biological variation that has bifurcated this monster into two separate creatures. Its attacks have the unique ability to mana burn their targets.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 80
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks. Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks.

An ancient evil spirit which possesses huge wings and sharp claws. It can be found within the Cursed Sanctuary, located at the deepest area inside the Sleepywood Dungeon in central Victoria Island. It still remains unknown as to how the Jr. Balrog was released inside the dungeon, but it is no mystery that the Jr. Balrog has a very high attack rate as well as powerful magic skills that will well exceed your expectation, especially its lethal magic attack called Meteor Magic, during which the Balrog drops meteorites it has summoned. It is one of the most challenging monsters to defeat on Victoria Island.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 80
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A monster that appears in the form of a giant wolf, occasionally found deep inside the valley of the snowfield. It walks on two feet like a human, and attacks with its sharp claws. Furthermore, it has high defense rate against physical and magic attacks, not to mention its ability to summon Werewolves when it finds itself in a disadvantageous situation. It is resistant against cold air but vulnerable to fire, so it would be wise to attack with fire attribute when hunting Lycanthrope.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 80
Form : Bird
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A bird-like monster with a long tail that resides in the Sky Nest area of Minar Forest. It has a ravishing blue tail and a lovely voice that complements its beauty. When attacked however, it will use its voice to seduce people in order to disable their ability to jump, putting them in danger.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 83
Form : Bird
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A bird-like monster with a long tail that resides in the Sky Nest area in Minar Forest. It has a ravishing reddish tail and a lovely voice that complements its beauty. If attacked however, it will use its voice to seduces people in order to lower their Accuracy, putting them in danger.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 82
Form : Animal
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks.

An odd couple found in the mountains far from El Nath. The Dark Yeti and Pepe, who have been consumed by the force of evil, boast more power in terms of attack and defense in comparison to that of regular Yeti and Pepe.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 88
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks.

A spirit that has the torso of a human and the lower body of a horse. It wears a helmet that has horns sticking out on each side, resembling a Viking warrior on a horse. It belongs to a group of warriors that have fought against each other for a long time just to prove their strength. The Black Kentaurus has the force of darkness, which explains its fear of attacks of sanctity attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 88
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attcks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A spirit that has the torso of a human and the lower body of a horse. It wears a helmet that has a red plume on top, resembling a Corinthian warrior on a horse. It belongs to a group of warriors that have fought against each other for a long time just to prove their strength. It possesses the power of fire attribute and fears attacks of coldness attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 88
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A spirit with a human torso and the lower body of a horse. It wears a helmet with a blue tassel and carries a spear in its hand which makes it look like a knight and its stead. As a warrior group that pursues strength, humans have apparently been at war with these Kentauruses for as long as one could remember. This spirit also has ice powers and is therefore vulnerable to fire attacks.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 85
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A monster that has big coiled horns which closely resemble those of a sheep. However, it has a black tail and a small pair of black wings, though no one has seen it fly. While it chews on grass and remains carefree, it will become furious when attacked, persistently chasing after the enemy. Although it looks like a mammal, some speculate that it is a species of its own.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 88
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Holy and Poison Attribute Attacks.

A monster that resembles a black sheep with huge horns. Contrary to its physical appearance as a sheep, it has a pair of small reddish wings and a reddish tail. Some claim that it is of the same family as Lucida for said reasons, but this claim has not been confirmed. Like Birk, Dual Birk will relentlessly chase after anyone that disturbs it while it grazes, even summoning spears from the sky to rain down upon those who enrage it.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 70
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire and Holy Attribute Attacks.

The confusion in time as a result of the Temporal Schism has affected countless numbers of clocks in Ludibrium. The Klock became a monster when an evil spirit animated it during the Temporal Schism.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 76
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks. Affected by Heal.

The confusion in time as a result of the Temporal Schism has affected countless numbers of clocks in Ludibrium. The Dark Klock became a monster when an evil spirit animated it during the Temporal Schism. This monster is an evolved form of Klock, and has acquired an even stronger force of darkness.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 90
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A monster born in an ocean of lava in a cave deep within the El Nath mountains. It was originally a bulldog before completely absorbing the mysterious force in lava, evolving into its current monstrous state. It has fire attribute and, as the ruler of the lava, it attacks by emitting flame of blazing heat. Some Bains have recently been bred and trained by the Flaming Raccoon in Showa Town to act as elite guards in their Hideout.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 92
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks. Affected by Heal.

A fish monster found in the deep waters of Aqua Road. Nothing but its skeleton is left, which makes it hard to determine what kind of fish it was before transforming into this monster. It threatens the adventurers with its freaky skeletal appearance and easily noticeable sharp teeth. People suspect that this monster was created during the weakening of the purifying force of Aqua Road.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 90
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A dragon monster that can be found in the Dragon Forest. While it belongs to the family of dragons, it falls under the category of lower ranking dragons despite its hard shell that gives this monster formidable defense. It is quick to bow down to any dragon of superior power, which explains its role as the loyal servant to Horntail. It is a monster of ice attribute; hence, it is vulnerable to attacks of fire attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 93
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A dragon monster that can be found in the Dragon Forest. While it belongs to the family of dragons, it falls under the category of lower ranking dragons despite its hard shell that gives this monster formidable defense. It is quick to bow down to any dragon of superior power, which explains its role as the loyal servant to Horntail. It is a monster of fire attribute; hence, it is vulnerable to attacks of ice attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 95
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning and Poison Attribute Attacks.

A dragon monster that can be found in the Dragon Forest. It is considered a dragon of intermediate strength, but has relatively low intelligence; hence, it is controlled by an unidentifiable creature that hides inside the egg on its back, which many people have suspected to be Horntail. Compared to its well-developed hind legs, its front legs are pitifully weak.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 97
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A dragon monster that can be found in the Dragon Forest. It is considered a dragon of intermediate strength, but has relatively low intelligence; hence, it is controlled by an unidentifiable creature that hides inside the egg on its back, which many people have suspected to be Horntail. It has frightening horns and is more ferocious than Rexton.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 93
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks.

There are particular entities that linger the infinitude of the space-time continuum, where no ordinary creature can reach by ordinary means; the Spirit Viking is one of them. The Spirit Viking has reached the Clocktower while wandering in the lost time, and wishes to go back to the world from which it came. It attacks people, believing that they are the ones responsible for the confusion which the Temporal Schism has created.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 98
Form : Devil

Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks.

There are particular entities that linger the infinitude of the space-time continuum, where no ordinary creature can reach by ordinary means; the Gigantic Spirit Viking is one of them. The Gigantic Spirit Viking has reached the Clocktower while wandering in the lost time, and wishes to go back to the world from which it came. It wears a flag on its back to find its lost family, and attacks any person it encounters, believing that they are responsible for the confusion which the Temporal Schism has created.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 94
Form : Fish
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%)to Fire and Poison Attribute Attacks.

A monster that appears in the form of a squid near the gorge deep in the waters of Aqua Road. They were believed to be extinct due to the function of purifying force in Aqua Road, but they have reappeared as the said force weakened. They protect themselves by releasing a cloud of thick, sticky venom and attack by squirting poisonous ink.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 95
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire and Holy Attribute Attacks. Affected by Heal.

A long time ago, the King of Ludibrium punished the sinners of heinous crimes by locking them inside a clock, forcing them to reflect on their sins for all eternity. However, the evil spirits that were locked inside the clocks were awoken during the Temporal Schism. Although said evil spirits are still imprisoned in the clock, their escape is becoming more and more plausible, not to mention that Phanom Watch has begun to attack those who are trying to change the dimensions, floating around in the air with a huge clock on its back.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 97
Form : Fish
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire and Lightning Attribute Attacks.

A monster that appears in the form of a squid near the gorge deep in the waters of Aqua Road. They were believed to be extinct due to the function of purifying force in Aqua Road, but they have reappeared as the said force weakened. It can charge electricity using its two ocelli, attacking its enemies with electricity attribute. If attacked by its electricity, your body may stiffen due to the shock.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 99
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire and Holy Attribute Attacks. Immune to Ice Attribute Attacks. Affected by Heal.

A long time ago, the King of Ludibrium punished the sinners of heinous crimes by locking them inside a clock, forcing them to reflect on their sins for eternity. However, the evil spirits that were locked inside the clocks were awoken during the Temporal Schism, and rather than seeking forgiveness and redemption, the evil spirits grew even more vengeful against Ludibrium. Although said evil spirits are still imprisoned in the clock, their escape is becoming more and more plausible, not to mention that Grim Phantom Watch has already begun to freely attack the adventurers.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 100
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks. Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A monster that attacks the ship of adventurers near the continent of Ossyria. It looks similar to the Jr. Balrogs that are found on Victoria Island, but the Crimson Balrogs fly using their huge wings. Some say that the habitat of the Crimson Balrogs is a floating island like Orbis, but this claim has not been confirmed. Due to its force of attack and magic skills that will surpass your expectation, it is suggested that you evade to a safe area should you find yourself in the midst of their attack, rather that hastily attack back. They are vulnerable to sanctity attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 100
Form : Fish
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A shark found in the deep waters of Aqua Road. The Shark turned even more ferocious as the purifying force of Aqua Road weakened. It attacks with its sharp teeth that can inflict deadly injuries, and can dispell any protections. Some daring adventurers hunt these Sharks to collect their teeth as a trophy.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 102
Form : Fish
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire and Ice Attribute Attacks.

A shark found in the deep waters of Aqua Road. The Cold Shark turned even more ferocious as the purifying force of Aqua Road weakened. It has a sharp saw-like protrusion near its mouth, and attacks with its sharp teeth that can inflict deadly injuries and will use the bitter cold aura surrounding it to slow adventurers, making it difficult for them to get away. Although its dorsal fin is said to make an exquisite dish, no adventurers other than those with exceptional courage would have what it takes to hunt a Cold Shark.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 100
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A ferocious dragon that lives in the Dragon Forest. It is of the intermediate rank in the family of dragons, and its notable traits include high intelligence and useful limbs that can freely move. With its threatening horns and muscular physique, this monster is physically strong; however, its flexibility and adaptability in using human tools to attack is one of the unique characteristics that render this monster a formidable enemy to defeat. The Cornians coat their daggers in a poisonous substance they collect from the Dragon Canyon flora. People claim that the family of Green Cornians are the closest to humans.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 105
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A ferocious dragon that lives in the Dragon Canyon. It is of the intermediate rank in the family of dragons, and its notable traits include high intelligence and useful limbs that can freely move. With its threatening horns and muscular physique, this monster is physically strong; however, its flexibility and adaptability in using human tools to attack is one of the unique characteristics that render this monster a formidable enemy to defeat. The Dark Cornians are considered the warriors of the Cornian family, as they can focus their inner spirit into their poison coated daggers when badly injured to greatly increase their battle power.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 97
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A ferocious dragon that lives in the Dragon Canyon. It has a huge pair of reddish wings but no front legs. It sets its nest in between the valleys, and has a decent level of intelligence, not to mention the wind it can create with its huge wings. It can also orally emit flames.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 101
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A ferocious dragon that lives in the Dragon Canyon. It has a huge pair of blue wings but no front legs. It sets its nest in between the valleys, and has a decent level of intelligence, not to mention the wind it can create with its huge wings. It can also orally emit an arctic blast of fridgid air.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 103
Form : Reptile

A ferocious dragon that lives in the Dragon Canyon. It has a huge pair of black wings but no front legs. It sets its nest in between the valleys, and has a decent level of intelligence, not to mention the wind it can create with its huge wings. It can conjure dark energy to strike its enemies with the powerful force of damnation.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 108
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks.

A powerful gate guardian that Papulatus summoned to prevent any form of intrusion into the operation room at the core of the Clocktower. It will make everyone and everything shiver in fear should anyone try to step into the warped corridor of the Clocktower. With a variety of powerful magic attacks, including stun, some victims will be unable to defend themselves as they wait for the inevitable strike from The Gatekeeper's phantom blade.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 108
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks. Affected by Heal.

A dark creature from an alternate dimension that Papulatus summoned to prevent any form of intrusion into the operation room at the core of the Clocktower. The Thanatos is a wizard of another dimension linked to the Dimensional Schism, and uses its formidable magical abilities to not only attack any adventurer trying to reach the core of the Clocktower, but will also curse, stun, weaken, seal and shroud adventurers in darkenss.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 105
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

An large dragon that lives in Manon's Forest deep within the Minar Forest. It is considered a high-ranking dragon, boasting various magic skills as well as a high level of intelligence. Its physical strength also contributes to the challenge for adventurers battling against this monster, as it is covered by tough dragon skin and has a breath that can melt even the toughest metals. It can also fly using its small wings. The Manons had an amicable relationship with the Hafrings, but due to the corruption from Horntail, they have become hostile towards one another.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 105
Form : Animal
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A strange race of creatures that live in Griffey Forest deep within the Minar Forest. They have the wings and head of an eagle, the tail of a lion and the body of a unicorn, along with the signature horn. They rival the strength of the dignified dragons, and they have set their nests in Leafre, which is considered to be the land of the dragons. As a race of high intelligence level and respect, the Griffeys, according to a hafring legend, are said to be loyal to heroes.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 105
Form : Reptile

A group of young dragons that still live in their nest. Ever since their amicable relationship with the Hafrings came to an end, they have been left unattended without the protection that the Hafrings once supplied. The Jr. Newties cannot leave their nests, but they have the power to attack using a sound wave at a distance. When the Jr. Newties are attacked, a messenger of the nest that protect the Jr. Newties may sometimes appear.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 110
Form : Enchanted

A golem that guards the nest of the Jr. Newties. This creature has made a deal with the evil dragons to guard their eggs by carrying around the nest on top of its head to protect the Jr. Newtie. It can be summoned when the Jr. Newtie becomes mortally wounded.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 110
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks. Affected by Heal

The Skelegons are a group of reanimated dragon skeletons that can be found roaming around the dragon nests near the mountain peaks of Leafre. They are unaware that they have died and have become Undead. They are the reincarnation of the dragons who were killed during the Dragon War, and will attack anything that comes near them, regardless of whether the approaching creature is a human, a hafring, a fellow dragon, or any other form of life.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 113
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks. Affected by Heal

The Skelesaurus are a group of reanimated dragon skeletons that can be found roaming around the dragon nests near the mountain peaks of Leafre. They are unaware that they have died and have become Undeads They are the reincarnation of the dragons who were killed during the Dragon War, and will attack anything that comes near them, regardless of whether the approaching creature is a human, a hafring, a fellow dragon, or any other form of life. Looking at the cane that they hold in one hand, they are suspected to have been a group of old veteran dragons.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 80
Form : Inorganic

An hourglass that was lost by a visitor who was traveling through the Temple. It does not correctly tell time because it has been cracked, but it is said to have gained the power to awaken an unknown creature from being left inside the Temple for so long. When it meets a temple visitor, it follows them around thinking they might be its owner. Because its power comes from the Temple itself, it turns into a regular, cracked hourglass if it is taken outside the Temple.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 91
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Lightning and Poison Attribute Attacks.

The Memory Monks stand at Memory Lane beyond the Gate of the Past, inside the Temple of Time. They serve Rhinne, the Goddess of Time. They wear a smiley mask that hints at nothing but happy memories, but no one really knows what they are feeling beneath those masks.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 94
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Lightning and Poison Attribute Attacks.

The Memory Monks stand at Memory Lane beyond the Gate of the Past, inside the Temple of Time. They serve Rhinne, the Goddess of Time. They wear a smiley mask that hints at nothing but happy memories, but no one really knows what they are feeling beneath those masks.
They are a level above the Memory Monks and often have a trainee following them on each side. The Monk trainees wear gray masks because they are not skilled enough to wear the smiley mask.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 98
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Lightning and Poison Attribute Attacks.

The Memory Guardians stand watch along the Memory Lanes, beyond the Gate of the Past, inside the Temple of Time. Its sole purpose is to protect Rhinne, the Goddess of Time. It once was a human knight, but throughout the many years of protecting the Goddess inside the Temple, it has cast off its humanness, leaving only its green spirit, its sword and the armor it once wore. Now, it only exists to serve the Goddess.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 101
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Lightning and Poison Attribute Attacks.

The Chiefs of the Memory Guardians stand watch along the Memory Lanes, beyond the Gate of the Past, inside the Temple of Time. Its sole purpose is to protect Rhinne, the Goddess of Time. Compared to the other guardians, its armor seems more sturdy and brilliantly decorated. It once was a high ranking human knight, but throughout the many years of protecting the Goddess inside the Temple, it has cast off its humanness. Now it only exists to serve the Goddess. The only evidence left that it was once human is its heart that contains beautiful memories.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 106
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire and Lightning Attribute Attacks.

The Qualm Monks stand at the Road of Regrets, beyond the Gate of the Past, inside the Temple of Time. They serve Rhinne, the Goddess of Time. In order to never have any regrets, they wear a neutral mask to restrain all emotions. However, no one knows what they are really feeling beneath those masks.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 109
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire and Lightning Attribute Attacks.

The Qualm Monks stand at the Road of Regrets, beyond the Gate of the Past, inside the Temple of Time. They serve Rhinne, the Goddess of Time. In order to never have any regrets, they wear a neutral mask to restrain all emotions. However, no one knows what they are really feeling beneath those masks.
They are a level above Qualm Monks and often have a trainee following them on each side. Monk trainees wear gray masks because they are not skilled enough to wear the neutral mask.

string.value:
Lv. : 113
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire and Lightning Attribute Attacks.

The Qualm Guardians stand at the Road of Regrets, beyond the Gate of the Past, inside the Temple of Time. Its sole purpose is to protect Rhinne, the Goddess of Time. It once was a human knight, but throughout the many years of protecting the Goddess inside the Temple, it has cast off its humanness, leaving only its blue spirit, its spear and the armor it once wore. Now, it only exists to serve the Goddess.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 116
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire and Lightning Attribute Attacks.

The Chiefs of the Qualm Guardians stand at the Road of Regrets, beyond the Gate of the Past, inside the Temple of Time. Its sole purpose is to protect Rhinne, the Goddess of Time. Compared to other guardians, its armor seems more sturdy and brilliantly decorated. It once was a high ranking human knight, but throughout the many years of protecting the Goddess inside the Temple, it has cast off its humanness. Now it only exists to serve the Goddess. The only evidence left of its lost humanity is its hardened heart that contains bitter memories.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 121
Form : Spirit
Special Traits : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice and Poison Attribute Attacks.

The Oblivion Monks stand at the Road to Oblivion, beyond the Gate of the Past, deep inside the Temple of Time. They serve Rhinne, the Goddess of Time. Because they have lost all of thier memories of the past, they wear a frowny mask. However, no one knows if the monks are even aware they have forgotten their past nor if they experience sadness because of it.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 124
Form : Spirit
Special Traits : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice and Poison Attribute Attacks.

The Oblivion Monks stand at the Road to Oblivion, beyond the Gate of the Past, deep inside the Temple of Time. They serve Rhinne, the Goddess of Time. Because they have lost all of thier memories of the past, they wear a frowny mask. However, no one knows if the monks are even aware they have forgotten their past nor if they experience sadness because of it.
They are a level above Oblivion Monks and often have a trainee following them on each side. Monk trainees wear gray masks because they are not skilled enough to wear the frowny mask.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 128
Form : Spirit
Special Traits : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice and Poison Attribute Attacks.

The Oblivion Guardians stand at the Road to Oblivion, beyond the Gate of the Past, inside the Temple of Time. Its sole purpose is to protect Rhinne, the Goddess of Time. It once was a human knight, but throughout the many years of protecting the Goddess inside the Temple, it has cast off its humanness, leaving only its red spirit, its halberd and the armor it once wore. Now, it only exists to serve the Goddess.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 131
Form : Spirit
Special Traits : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice and Poison Attribute Attacks.

The Chiefs of the Oblivion Guardians stand at the Road to Oblivion, beyond the Gate of the Past, inside the Temple of Time. Its sole purpose is to protect Rhinne, the Goddess of Time. Compared to other guardians, its armor seems more sturdy and brilliantly decorated. It once was a high ranking human knight, but throughout the many years of protecting the Goddess inside the Temple, it has cast off its humanness. Now it only exists to serve the Goddess. The only evidence left of its lost humanity is its shriveled heart that remains as an empty shell of lost memories.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 83
Form : Spirit

An ancient creature that's been dormant for a long period of time. They say that Eliza used to be the beloved pet of the Goddess Minerva who once ruled over Orbis. Unfortunately, the Pixies kidnapped the Goddess while Eliza was asleep, and took over Eliza's nesting place. The angry Eliza exploded in furor and created numerous doppelgangers as an expression of its rage, which now roam the Stairway to the Sky. When Eliza is calm, it can actually be a pretty interesting conversationalist. Elliza enjoys listening to music, which often puts this creature to sleep.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 90
Form : Mammal

According to legend, the Snowman was born between a human and a Snow Spirit. It has the soul of a human but was born with the appearance of a monster which caused him much grief growing up as he was constantly taunted by other humans. The Snow Spirit, who watched Snowman's sad situation, froze up an entire mountain range for Snowman and called it El Nath. Snowman doesn't like humans and hence stays away from them as much as possible, but he'd never attack a human first on his own. However, it will mercilessly attack anyone who damages or breaks the Statue of the Snow Spirit that exists deep in the El Nath Valley. It has befriended a large Hector, who was also tormented in its youth because of its gigantic size, so the two have become kindred spirits.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 85
Form : Enchanted

An unknown creature sometimes known as the Alchemist's experiment-gone-wrong and sometimes known as the strange genius Yulete's experimental creation. This strange creature, which is neither animal nor Roid, is often spotted around secret passageways that are only known by some. Some say that it was created in a secret laboratory hidden in such a secret passageway, and there are rumors that claim that someone had left Chimera there for a specific purpose. So far, none of the rumors surrounding Chimera have been confirmed.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 120
Form : Reptile
Special Traits : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

Master of the Dragon Canyon, the Leviathan is the loyal servant of Horntail. Born from a glowing silver egg, it has grown to become the protector and ruler of all the Wyverns in the Canyon. The Leviathan attacks travellers that approach the Cave of Life while silently hovering over the canyon skies, flying around with its silky smooth snake-like skin and wings. It is a much-feared creature in the canyon.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 121
Form : Fish
Special Traits : Resistant (-50%) to Ice, Lightning and Poison Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A very rare giant whale that only lives along the Memory Lanes inside the Temple of Time. With its thick fins, Dodo swims through the air instead of the water, eating pieces of memory that float around. It is said that it only eats happy memories so it is always in a good mood. It often gives the Temple Keeper a headache because it even eats the memories of those visiting the Temple of Time, but because it is an endangered species, there's nothing he can do about it.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 131
Form : Spirit
Special Traits : Resistant (-50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks.

They say Lilynouch was a well known and respected human knight in the past. He couldn't find a lord he wanted to serve, so he decided to offer his services to the Goddess Rhinne and live his life outside of the flow of time. Since he was positioned to guard the Road of Regrets, he hardened his heart to protect it from having any regrets. By doing this, he eventually lost his humanness and is now known as the Ice Knight. He is known to be too strict and too serious, even attacking approved visitors, believing they are in the Temple to disturb the Goddess's sleep. As a result, he doesn't get along with the Temple Keeper.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 141
Form : Animal
Special Traits : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A prisoner of the Temple of Time who was locked up after committing an atrocious crime. It should've received a much more severe punishment for what it did; however, Goddess Rhinne was considerate of the fact that Lyka was born evil and that it would be unfair for it to bear all of the responsibility for its actions. So instead, Rhinne decided to lock it up inside the Road to Oblivion so that the Flame of Oblivion can burn away its evil heart... However, even after all these years, Lyka's vile nature still remains, making the Temple Keeper tremble in fear.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 85
Form : Object

There's a famous merchant that can be found at the Ant Tunnel Park located at the Center Dungeon of Victoria Island. Venture further into the dungeon, however, and you'll run into a mysterious street vendor that appears periodically. The interesting part about this street vendor is that not one individual has made a purchase from the vendor as of yet. Apparently that's because once someone approaches the vendor, it does a 180. The merchant at the Park seems to be annoyed by the sudden appearance of competition in the area.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 125
Form : Enchanted
Special Traits : 1st Form: Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks.
2nd Form: Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks.

A monster from another world who landed here as a result of the Dimensional Schism. It may have numerous personalities, but all of those personalities are uniformly evil. It contributed to the progression of the Dimensional Schism with the force of Ludibrium, and turned all the toys of Ludibrium into monsters. They say that Papulatus is increasingly endowed with more and more power from the forces of the other world as the Dimensional Schism slowly grows larger and larger over time.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 110
Form : Fish
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A ferocious fish monster that lives in a cave under the ocean. According to legend, this enormous fish once enjoyed life as an immortal, but was banished to the Maple World after it ate its friend because it was hungry. Now, trapped inside a cave because of its enormous size, its crippling lonliness and boredom has caused it to conjure a clone of itself to break the monotony. 
The real Pianus lives on the right side of the cave, and is more powerful than its clone. Although it does not move, it is the King of the deep sea and has a number of powerful attacks including shooting a giant laser beam out of its mouth, summoning Blood Booms and dropping 10-ton weights on anyone who disturbs its solitude with its clone.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 110
Form : Fish
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A ferocious fish monster that lives in the cave under the ocean. According to legend, this enormous fish once enjoyed life as an immortal, but was banished to the Maple World after it ate its friend because it was hungry. Now, trapped inside a cave because of its enormous size, its crippling lonliness and boredom has caused it to conjure a clone of itself to break the monotony.
The clone of Pianus lives on the left side of the cave, and is less powerful than the real one. The clone mimicks everything the real one does, including all of its attacks, such as shooting a laser beam out of its mouth, summoning Blood Booms and dropping 10-ton weights on anyone who disturbs it and its real counterpart.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 140
Form : Devil
Special Trait : 1st Body: Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks.
2nd Body: Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.
3rd Body: Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A dormant spirit of the Zakum tree which previously was without any intellect or malevolent notions. The tree started to show signs of life when it began to be fueled by the greed of the ancient miners who dug into the mountain looking for gold. The ancient town within the lava region, despite being built in the midst of all the darkness, burning flames and scorching heat of the El Nath volcanoes, survived because of the greedy passions of its residents. Apparently, the dark and shady emotions of the humans living in the area were somehow absorbed by Zakum over time. Zakum used to be a small, neglected tree, but has now grown extremely powerful thanks to the darkness, greed and negative energy of the human residents who once lived in the lava region. As its power grew, it began to take control of the miners and townsfolk, forcing them to build a Statue of it and worship it as their God. The spirit of Zakum, now locked inside the giant statue deep in the lava caves, anxiously waits for adventures to challenge it so that it may continue to feed on their desires and greed and become even stronger...

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 160
Form : Reptile

The first dragon that's ever stood up against the Dragon Chief, Nine Spirit, who was the former ruler over Minar Forest. Horntail assembled an army of evil dragons to create an evil force that instigated the historically-known Dragon War. Horntail seemed to be the more powerful one at the beginning, but Nine Spirit's longstanding experience and wisdom as a leader seemed to overpower Horntail's inexperience. In the end, Horntail broke the Pact between the dragons and Hafrings and attacked the Hafrings' village, stealing the egg of Nine Spirit which they were protecting. This was a crime that no dragon known as the guardian of order should have committed. Ultimately, Horntail overthrew the reign of Nine Spirit, and the forest was conquered by the demonic servants of Horntail. Since then, no traces of true, honorable dragons can be found in the forest. Horntail, who has three heads and, subsequently, three different minds, is currently hiding in the Cave of Life to heal his wounds, and is actively plotting to rule the regions beyond Minar Forest and Leafre using the egg of Nine Spirit.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 40
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice, Fire, Lightning and Holy Attribute Attacks.

It is a mutated slime which once was a regular slime before transforming into a King Slime due to Lakelis and her sisters experimenting with magic. Though it looks like a regular slime of jelly-like substance, it can probably turn the world upside down with its gigantic, heavy body. Lakelis and her sisters are now recruiting adventurers who can defeat this King Slime before it causes too much havoc.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 56
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Attacks of All Elemental Attributes.

A peculiar creature that swims the vast sea of time and space with its gigantic body. It is a monster that threatens the adventurers lost in the dimensional imbalance, although it, too, is a victim of the Dimensional Schism. It is a creature of powerful strength as well as an invincible monster, as Alishar cannot be completely destroyed but only chased away.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 115
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Attacks of All Elemental Attributes. Affected by Heal

Sharen III, the ruler of the great empire that once existed in the highlands known as Sharenian, called out this evil spirit to guard the legendary jewel, Rubian. Ergoth, whom Sharen III revived, betrayed Sharen III by using the power of Rubian to destroy Sharenian and building his own empire on top of the remains. After a long time passed, the ruins of Sharenian was discovered, and the people who went inside to explore laid their hands on Rubian; this awakened Ergoth, who had been asleep for a long time.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 65
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Attacks of All Elemental Attributes.

Papa Pixie, also known as the Grand Pixie, is the King of all pixies. The pixies once had a floating island of their own, but the island fell from the sky and sank underwater when it could no longer support the weight of the increasing number of pixies. The pixies have since come to Orbis, and have attacked the Goddess Minerva, sealing her inside a broken statue, and claiming Orbis as their new home. However, the number of pixies has been growing yet again, and according to Spiruna, Orbis is now in danger of falling into the sea as well! 
As an experienced and powerful pixie who's had extensive training in magic, the Papa Pixie can cast powerful and debilitating spells that will surpass your expectation. Some say his long mustache is the source of his power.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 60
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Attacks of All Elemental Attributes.

A longtime pirate captain who has dominated the oceans of Ossyria for many years. Known for its uncontested domination of the Ossyria oceans, Lord Pirate has raided and conqured numerous people and civilizations and has collected countless sums of treasure over the years. Recently, Lord Pirate ended up in stormy waters after following a map that was discovered on some desert island. Lord Pirate has been injured since then and has docked near Herb Town to recuperate. Despite the injury, Lord Pirate lost nothing of its vicious character. In fact, it has been using Herb Town as its strategic base to invade the nearby Kingdom of Bellflower, holding them captive as slaves. Guon, an old yet loyal subject, is currently recruiting adventurers to rescue the prince Bellflower Root, Wu Yang, who has been taken prisoner by Lord Pirate.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 81/84
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : 2nd Form: Resistant (-50%) to Lightning and Poison Attribute Attacks.

A powerful Roid created by combining Zenumist magic and Alcadno technology, the Frankenroid is made of steel limbs and a body that carries all sorts of weapons inside, not to mention a brain that is equivalent in intelligence to that of a human. This exquisite machinery was created by an alchemist, whose name, however, is being purposely witheld by the heads of both Societies.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 20
Form : Animal

An aggressive black rooster. This little bird tends to believe that it is very fearsome, and often get into fights with others. It is said that their claws are quite nasty. Their feet, when stewed, are considered a local delicacy.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 22
Form : Animal

A harmless-looking duck. The red scarf around its neck signifies that someone may have raised him. Its eggs are very delicious.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 25
Form : Animal

It's a sheep found grazing the plains of southern China. It's the target of many because of its high quality wool. In order to protect themselves, these sheep turned from peaceful creatures into quite violent and aggressive animals.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 30
Form : Animal

It's a goat that resembles almost what looks like an old man. Their horns are quite dangerous, and they are prone to charge when bothered, so be careful not to stand in front of them.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 35
Form : Animal

This black goat's temper is short. It looks intimidating with its black wooly coat and glowing red eyes. It is stronger than the white goat. Do not underestimate its ability to crush you under its hooves! It will charge at anyone who is foolish enough to provoke it.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 33
Form : Animal 

This old cow is always seen grazing the southern Chinese fields. Although its frame is large and its legs are strong, it is far too lazy to attack anyone who provokes it.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 38
Form : Animal

This great ox toils in the field day in and day out. As a result of all that work, it is very strong. Its temper is short, so be very careful around it and make sure to never to provoke it.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 37
Form : Animal

This sheep is different from the white variety in that it is naturally aggressive. People in the past who tried to get their hands on its wool came back bruised and injured, so its wool has an especially high value.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 25 
Form : Bird
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks.

Crows can be found living in the prairies outside Mushroom Shrine. They are a local nuisance to the citizens of Mushroom Shrine and fly back and forth in an attempt to drive people away.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 30 
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

These types of Raccoons are always carrying firewood. Unfortunately, this firewood has ignited, and they run around trying to extinguish it before they return home.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 30 
Form : Animal
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

These are wild foxes who live in the hills outside the Mushroom Shrine. They are an odd species who believe the leaves on their heads help them camouflage themselves and confuse people.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 60 
Form : Undead
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire, Ice and Holy Attribute Attacks. Affected by Heal.

These creatures died with resentment and therefore couldn't leave this world. Now, the Night Ghosts can be seen floating around the Desolate Cemetery outside the Mushroom Shrine, searching for something in the darkness.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 45 
Form : Animal
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks.

These wild foxes live in the farther outskirts of the Mushroom Shrine, closer to the Desolate Cemetery. The darkness of the cemetery has begun to affect the Dark Cloud Fox, and it is stronger than the Cloud Fox. They also believe the leaf on their heads help them camouflage and confuse people.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 40 
Form : Undead
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Affected by Heal.

These lanterns once belonged to people who were attacked and died at night. The Paper Lantern Ghosts are now monsters, reanimated because of a curse placed on them after the person died.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 60 
Form : Demon
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

It is a monster that is said to be the lord of the river. The river, which was once pristine and clear, has recently become badly polluted by humans. The Water Goblins have since become angry at humans and will attack them upon sight. Cucumbers are their favourite food, but they will use them as weapons when they are attacking humans.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv : 100 
Form : Undead
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks. Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks. Affected by Heal.

Its true identity was that of a village girl who, long ago, was offered to an ancient God as a sacrifice and lost her life. The Hime, also known as the Dreamy Ghost, has returned to the world again without being able to abandon her attachment to life. She has no memory of being a human, and any traveler who meets this unfortunate creature by the statue of the ancient God she was once sacrificed to, will quickly be attacked due to the loneliness and the vengance the Dreamy Ghosts still harbor within.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv : 115 
Form : Demon
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks.

A monk who lost his conscience while pursuing ancient knowledge out in the far wilderness of the Mushroom Shrine. Likely corrupted by the same ancient God the Dreamy Ghosts were once sacrificed to, the Tengu, also known as Black Crow, will attack anyone who disturbs their constant search for knowledge without mercy. They retain powerful spells from their lives as monks, and can easily vanquish any traveler who is unfortunate enough to interrupt them.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv : 45 
Form : Human
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire and Poison Attribute Attacks.

Gangsters that have practiced kendo, the art of the sword, since they were young. They have been recruited by the Flaming Raccoon Syndicate because of their skills and their penchant for violence. They feel restless unless they are carrying a bamboo or wooden sword.
