string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv : 47 
Form : Human
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire and Poison Attribute Attacks.

A man who used to be a bricklayer in a poor downtown area. He was given a job by the Flaming Raccoon Syndicate to help build the Hideout building. Due to his gambling addiction, he was also given a loan by Hideout Finance, but ended up unable to repay the loan, and so he is now forced to work as a gangster for the Hideout.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv : 50 
Form : Human
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire and Poison Attribute Attacks.

This gangster once had a dream of becoming a famous baseball player when he grew up. Unable to finance his dream, his desperation made him step into the dark world of the Flaming Raccoon Syndicate in hopes of earning enough money. But the Flaming Raccoon has no intention of ever paying this gangster enough to pursue his dream, and as a result, his baseball bat has since become a weapon to injure others.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv : 72 
Form : Human
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire, Ice and Holy Attribute Attacks.

This is a girl who lost her parents when she was young, and was living as an orphan in the village of Showa. The Boss of The Flaming Raccoon found her, and taught her to survive in the dark world. Under The Boss's tutelage, she has become a skilled fighter, and now helps guard the Hideout. It is rumored that she has connections in the government of Showa.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv : 62 
Form : Human
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire and Poison Attribute Attacks.

An impulsive and slightly crazed swordsman dressed in an extravagant manner. He is the leader of a group of Extras in the Hideout. He received the scar on his face in a fight with another swordsman. It is now a mark he wears with pride.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv : 64 
Form : Human
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire and Poison Attribute Attacks.

He is a leader of a group of Extras in the Hideout. Not much is known about him besides the fact that he likes to flaunt his money and gamble. He is dressed sloppily, always wearing a jacket and sandals.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv : 152 
Form : Human
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks.

He is one of The Boss's personal bodyguards. He is rumored to have once served in an elite regiment in the Army, but was expelled for his merciless treatment of prisoners. He is dressed in an all black suit, and never smiles. As The Boss's personal bodyguard, he is an extremely powerful and dangerous man.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv : 155 
Form : Human
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attack

He is one of The Boss's personal bodyguards. He was jailed for plotting terror attacks with large amounts of explosives on government buildings, but walked free because of a lack of evidence. He is a loose cannon, and is known for laughing hysterically whilst beating up his opponents. As The Boss's personal bodyguard, he is an extremely powerful and dangerous man.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv : 95 
Form : Human
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire and Lightning Attribute Attacks.

He is the owner of the Hideout building in Showa Town's industrial district. Despite knowing that The Boss is a monster, he continues to deal with the Flaming Raccoon, possibly out of fear. He is married to the Female Boss.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv : 130 
Form : Human
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning and Holy Attribute Attacks.

The wife of the Male Boss. Before she became involved with the Flaming Raccoon, she owned a restaurant. Like many other business owners, she was more or less forced to cooperate with The Boss. Now she is in it for the money, although she knows that The Boss is a monster. She is much stronger and far more dangerous than her husband.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv : 90 
Form : Plant 
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

It's a huge blue mushroom with white polka dots. Both in size and appearance, it is very similar to the Mushmom of Victoria Island, which is rumored to be the mother of all mushrooms. Blue Mushmom behaves similarly to Mushmom, but it is far more dangerous and has an extremely high avoidability. If it spots you, it will launch itself into the air and come crashing down, shaking the surrounding ground with tremendous force. Legends say that Blue Mushmom was the wife of Mushmom, but that they are now separated due to differences in opinion. The truth, however, remains a mystery.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 180
Form : Human
Special Trait : Human Form: Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy and Poison Attribute Attacks. Toad Form: Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks. Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A toad monster that has extended its life for an unfathomably long time. The Toad has enticed the real Emperor of the Ninja Castle to go along with his scheme, and has been in control of the Castle ever since. Mimicking the form of the former Emperor, the Castellan Toad will show its true form if it receives enough damage. No one has yet to spot the real Emperor.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Level : Lv.160
Type : Mechanical
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks. Immune to Holy and Poison Attribute Attacks.

A fierce human-like robot registered under the Grosswall unit under the Army of Blaze. It is usually stationed inside the Roppongi Mall building to protect the headquarters of the Army. However, in the past, this unit went on violent rampages against the residents of Tokyo, seemingly for no purpose other than pure evil. Unlike other robots, this robot is equipped with a giant shield that is big enough to cover its whole body, and uses it to block most attacks of regular level. It's a far more advanced model than the Imperial Guard, and is usually seen commanding legions of Imperial Guards stationed in various parts of future Zipangu.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Level : Lv.180
Type : Spirit
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice and Poison Attribute Attacks. Immune to Holy Attribute Attacks.

A spirit summoned by Dunas from another dimension. Her looks are dazzling and beautiful, like that of an angel, but her power is as great as an evil God.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Level : Lv.164
Type : Immortal
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks. Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks.

One of the early protectors of Zipangu. After finding out Ashray has been trapped at the end of Zipangu's future, he does everything he can to save her from the purgatory. Unfortunately, she is trapped in the world of nothing that was created after Zipangu's destruction, so the only way to save her is by changing history. Re-writing history is directly correlated to Zipangu's destruction, but he still does it nonetheless. After he managed to break free from Asia's seal, he reappears in Shibuya for one final showdown.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Level : Lv.170
Type : Mechanical
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire and Lightning Attribute Attacks. Immune to Holy and Poison Attribute Attacks.

A marvel of science. A machine equipped with artificial intelligence so great that it grew sentient, and seized control of the whole Army of Blaze. It was initially produced to maintain peace in Zipangu, but when Marr fell into a coma as a result of pollution, it offered to become her life support. While serving as the life support, it conducted its own research on how the pollution came about, and when it realized that the pollution had come as a direct result of humanity's crimes against the planet and all other lifeforms on it, as well as the slow reaction from the residents of Zipangu, it came up with the conclusion of destroying Zipangu and its population as the only solution. Since then, it has waged war against mankind, directing the Army towards the destruction of Zipangu while standing patiently by the girl that has yet to wake up. It is unprotected, and possesses no weaponry of its own, as it views itself as a creation of peace and balance. Instead, it calls upon hordes of enraged soldiers from the Army of Blaze to its assistance when threatened.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 28
Form : Devil

The pollutants accumulated in the CBD were gathered together and brought to life by a hidden force of evil. Stopnow enjoys stealing road signs to confuse the local citizens. Its shy nature causes it to hide behind the larger and heavier Stop Signs, but it often topples over due to the sign'sweight.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 38
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

The pollutants accumulated in the CBD were gathered together and brought to life by a hidden force of evil. Freezer enjoys stealing fire extinguishers from the buildings in the city, and carries them around by balancing them on its head.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 18
Form : Devil

The pollutants accumulated in the CBD area were gathered together and brought to life by a hidden force of evil. Biner enjoys terrorizing the local citizens by jumping out at them from the trashcans and recycle bins. It can be found easily by following the trail of rubbish.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 33
Form : Devil

The pollutants accumulated in the CBD were gathered together and brought to life by a hidden force of evil. Like Stopnow, Nospeed also enjoys stealing road signs to confuse the local citizens. It prefers the lighter Speed Limit Signs, which it proudly attaches to its back.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 50
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

The pollutants accumulated in the CBD were gathered together and brought to life by a hidden force of evil. Tippo Red can often be found in the Boat Quay area. It cannot swim, so it steals a bright yellow swimming float with a red pattern and carries it around.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 53
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

The pollutants accumulated in the CBD were gathered together and brought to life by a hidden force of evil. Tippo Blue can often be found in the Boat Quay area. It cannot swim, so it steals a bright yellow swimming float with a blue pattern and carries it around.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 23
Form : Devil

The pollutants accumulated in the CBD were gathered together and brought to life by a hidden force of evil. Batoo enjoys diving at people's heads to scare the local citizens. Despite its larger size, it moves very fast. Its wings are often damaged by encounters with the local birds.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 48
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks.

The pollutants accumulated in the CBD were gathered together and brought to life by a hidden force of evil. Trucker is bolder than the others and steals trucks from the carparks and even from the loading bays. It sometimes hides under the hood of the truck to check if the truck's owner is around.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 43
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Poison Attribute Attacks.

The pollutants accumulated in the CBD were gathered together and brought to life by a hidden force of evil. Octobunny can often be found in the Boat Quay area, attacking the boats docked there. The octopus on its head appears to be a live octopus that the Octobunny befriended, and it squirts ink when threatened.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 58
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks. Affected by Heal.

Pac Pinky is the second lowest ranked of the ghostly sailors aboard the Ghost Ship, charged with the task of fishing for food. It wears a bored expression on its face, and often wanders out further away from the ship and nearer to the quay.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 63
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning and Holy Attribute Attacks. Affected by Heal.

Slimy is the lowest ranked of the ghostly sailors aboard the Ghost Ship, charged with the task of cleaning the ship. It wears a sad expression on its face because of its long and fruitless job, and can also be found outside the ship.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 60
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Affected by Heal.

Selkie Jr. is the third lowest ranked of the ghostly sailors aboard the Ghost Ship, mostly working on the deck. It can be recognized by the big grin on its face, and seems to have picked up a few tricks with its rope while working on the deck of the Ghost Ship.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 68
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Affected by Heal.

Mr. Anchor is the second most powerful of the ghostly sailors aboard the Ghost Ship, preceded only by the Captain, Latanica. It can be found carrying an anchor around the inner areas of the Ghost Ship. Although it always seems to be grinning, its eyes are said to be filled with fury.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 100
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks.

Many years ago, Capt. Latanica was once a captain of a beautiful tourist cruise ship, one of the largest in the Singapore waters. One night, when one of the tours took them out further than usual, beyond the region of the Seven Seas, they encountered a mysterious storm. The whole ship vanished that night and was never seen again, until now. The former cruise liner is now a Ghost Ship, and it is currently docked at the shores of Singapore. All of its former crew have become ghosts, and now haunt the ship and the shoreline where it is docked, under the corrupt and confused command of Capt. Latanica.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 85
Form : Devil

The pollutants left over in the old city were gathered together and brought to life by a hidden force of evil to be more powerful than their modern city cousins. Berserkie has so much strength that it cannot help but uproot trees in a state of fury. It constantly perspires in an attempt to dilute the source of its strength, but it does not seem to be working.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 90
Form : Devil

The pollutants left over in the old city were gathered together and brought to life by a hidden force of evil to be more powerful than their modern city cousins. With a more compact size than Berserkie, Veetron's prowess is in its speed. It is particularly attached to a kind of local bug, which it carries around over its head to prevent it from being eaten by Slygies.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 95
Form : Spirit

The Slygie used to be a type of giant earthworm that lived peacefully underground. However, as its living habitat became smaller and the hidden evil force grew stronger, it gradually became evil and started appearing and attacking the inhabitants of the city indiscriminately. Oddly, its favorite food is a kind of beetle.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 110
Form : Spirit

The Petrifighter is a pure fusion of rocks, plants and other urban debris, brought to life by the evil forces hidden in Ulu City. Its heavy steps rock the ground it walks on, and it walks faster than its bulk indicates. Its sole purpose in life is to fight, never hesitating as it swings a large, heavy slab of concrete at anyone that approaches.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 105
Form : Spirit

The Montrecer was a young tree spirit that mistakenly rooted itself to the inside of an abandoned car and as it grew bigger, it became forever trapped and angry with its state. It moves around very slowly, even though it is trapped in a car, because it has no front wheels, so it is forced to walk on hits rear wheels. It is capable of doing great damage with its exposed roots, and can stun anyone who comes near it.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 115
Form : Spirit

Before the evil presence began corrupting the area, Duku was the treasured tree of the Ulu City, as the only plant bearing the rare Rafflesia flower. Now it paralyzes and saps the energy of anybody it meets, sending the collected energy to other monsters through those very flowers. It bears a suspiciously strong resemblance to the prominent evil of Ulu City, Krexel.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 140
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Left Eye: Resistant (-50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.
Right Eye: Resistant (-50%) to Ice and Poison Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

When Capt. Latanica brought Krexel to Ulu City from the Seven Seas, it was just a seedling no bigger than a blue snail. After it took root in an apartment, it began to feed on the energy of the land while spreading its malevolent presence across the entire city. Before long, it grew to its current size, and together with its minions, forced the citizens of Ulu City out of their homes. It became so powerful that even Capt. Latanica could not control it anymore, and Krexel now dominates the abandoned city from the top of its apartment.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 45
Form : Devil

The pollutants accumulated in the Metropolis were gathered together and brought to life by a hidden force of evil. Chlorotrap enjoys terrorizing the local citizens by jumping out at them from under the ground. It disguises itself by planting a young oil palm tree on its head.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 47
Form : Devil

The pollutants accumulated in the Metropolis were gathered together and brought to life by a hidden force of evil. Emo Slime has a depressed nature and it finds that music helps cheer it up. It is not as good as its little tag-a-long in singing, so it steals Rebabs from the locals to play a tune. It will become aggressive if someone tries to reclaim the stolen Rebab.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 52
Form : Devil

The pollutants accumulated in the Metropolis were gathered together and brought to life by a hidden force of evil. Dark Fission bears surface resemblance to the local monkeys, but its body is shaped like a cube and it has enviable fine golden hair styled like a famous star.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 56
Form : Devil

The pollutants accumulated in the Metropolis were gathered together and brought to life by a hidden force of evil. Oly Oly has an elongated body and arms that are suitable for rolling away the tires it steals from cars.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 59
Form : Devil

When a pair of mysterious monsters infiltrated the theme park, they brought the mascot dolls of the theme park to life. The cowardly Scaredy Scarlion immediately began trying to hide itself. It is always panicking and would rather run away than fight.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 59
Form : Devil

When a pair of mysterious monsters infiltrated the theme park, they brought the mascot dolls of the theme park to life. Ratatula chose to dress with a stolen dark short coat and a gentleman's Victorian silk tall hat to compliment its huge grin.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 61
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

The pollutants accumulated in the Metropolis were gathered together and brought to life by a hidden force of evil. The Rodeo bears surface resemblance to the local dogs, and has been tamed by an odd little monster that hangs from Rodeo's back as the dark hound runs freely.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 65
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

The pollutants accumulated in the Metropolis were gathered together and brought to life by a hidden force of evil. This clever monster has learned the art of snake charming with a flute and carries a pot with a deadly snake inside strapped to its back.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 68
Form : Devil

When a pair of mysterious monsters infiltrated the theme park, they brought the mascot dolls of the theme park to life. Jester Scarlion wanted to be like a clown that it once saw, and dressed up to fit the part. It is doing a fine job so far as it rolls around on a dented barrel while holding balloons.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 72
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Poison Attribute Attacks.

When a pair of mysterious monsters infiltrated the theme park, they brought the mascot dolls of the theme park to life. Froscola has an inventor's soul, and it wanted to make a new type of weapon nobody has seen before. It got its wish, using the material that lies just within the doors of the now abandoned fast food restaurants of the Park. The contraption Froscola built will blast park visitors with pressurized soda pop.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 75
Form : Devil

Yabber Doo is different from the other monsters in the theme park. It was actually a pair of monsters from the Metropolis. They got lost and hijacked a bus from the theme park in order to return to the city, and even changed their own shape to act as the wheels and the driver. However, they have not made any progress so far.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 82
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire and Poison Attribute Attacks.

When a pair of mysterious monsters infiltrated the theme park, they brought the mascot dolls of the theme park to life. The first thing the Booper Scarlion went for was a toy plane, fixing it and making it work good as new. It has always wanted to fly. Although the toy plane cannot not fly very high, it can shoot short distance missiles.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 87
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire and Lightning Attribute Attacks.

When a pair of mysterious monsters infiltrated the theme park, they brought the mascot dolls of the theme park to life. Vikerola admires the Vikings so much that it dressed up and got itself a wooden boat to row in. It actually looks very convincing as one.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 94
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks.

When a pair of mysterious monsters infiltrated the theme park, they brought the mascot dolls of the theme park to life. Gallopera could not get the impression of children having fun on the carousel out of its mind, so it had to try it out. It then found out how addictive it is and now refuses to share the carosel's pony with anyone else.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 140
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks.

With its true name unknown, this mysterious being is a child-like spirit who lives on the mountain that the Fantasy Theme Park is built on. After watching the fun and listening to the laughter coming from the theme park, this spirit and its best friend decided to join in the fun. Its real form is too inconvenient, so it imitated the form of one of the theme park's mascots, Targa. Although it does not understand why people keep running away from it, it has enjoyed the theme park thoroughly. Recently though, there have been people armed with weapons attacking it and it has taken to disguising itself as a statue with its best friend to hide from them. However, as it takes more damage, it slowly becomes angry, then furious and will attack back in earnest.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 140
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice and Lightning Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. 

With its real name unknown, this mysterious being is a naive spirit who lives on the mountain that the Fantasy Theme Park is built on. It led a lonely life until it met it's best friend, and then wanted to make more friends. After observing the theme park for a while, this spirit and its best friend decided to visit. Its real form is too inconvenient so it imitated the form of one of the mascots from the theme park, Scarlion. Although it is deeply saddened because the people keep running away from it, the rides are so fun that it will easily become distracted from its sadness. Recently though, there have been people armed with weapons attacking it and it has taken to disguising itself as a statue with its best friend to hide from them. However, as it takes more damage, it slowly becomes angry, then furious and will attack back in earnest.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 25
Form : Human
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire and Poison Attribute Attacks.

A Low-tier Ninja that has been diligently training at the Ninja Town. Genin's skills may not be on par with the Ninjas of higher level, but their penchant for blades should not be ignored.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 50
Form : Human
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire and Lightning Attribute Attacks.

A Mid-tier Ninja that worked himself up from Low-tier Ninja. Chunin is an expert at threatening the masses with blow darts. Watch out for a black, shadowy figure behind. your. back.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 80
Form : Human
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks. Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A Mid-tier Ninja that worked himself all the way to the high-tier Ninja. Master of the throwing star, Jonin prefers using large stars to inflict maximum damage. His training has made him immune to poison.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 100
Form : Human
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks. Immune to Fire, Ice, Poison and Holy Attribute Attacks.

Ninto is the head of the Ninjas. Due to a number of past battles within the Ninja Castle, he encountered a number of life and death situations, and... no one can confirm whether he's really alive or not. He is an incredibly dangerous ninja who can manipulate the energy in the environment around him and use it at will, with devastating power. He has also trained extensively in defensive techniques and is completely immune to various forms of elemental energy.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 30
Form : Human
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice and Poison Attribute Attacks.

A soldier that believes that the emperor inside the castle is the real deal. Ashigaru will use the spear he carries to attack anyone trying to enter farther into the Ninja Castle.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 120
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice, Lightning and Holy Attribute Attacks. Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks. Affected by Heal.

A powerful ninja that perished years ago in a chaotic battle in the confines of the Ninja Castle. He now wanders around the castle as a ghost, unable to let go of the past. He moves slow because of the heavy armor he wears, but will move with frightning speed when attacking with his katana.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 135
Form : Mechanical
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire, Ice and Holy Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks. Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A transportation vehicle registered under the Grosswall unit under the Army of Blaze. Its main duty is transportation, but it usually works around the area of battle, so the Afterlords are also equipped with cannons and heavy artillery should it see combat. It is also equipped with small robots, which examine and perform maintenance on other machines.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 137
Form : Mechanical
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire, Ice and Holy Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks. Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A weapon of intelligence registered under the Grosswall unit under the Army of Blaze. The Overlord observes the battlefield from the sky, which allows the headquarters to gather up valuable information on the progress of the war. It is equiped with a powerful laser and machine gun to attack opposition from the skies. It is also equipped with a very high-performance lens that can spot a speck of dust from a few hundred meters above ground, so it also performs the duty of patrolling around Tokyo.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 132
Form : Mechanical
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire, Ice and Holy Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks. Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A factory robot developed by Zipangu Tech Lab, but was then remodeled to a combat robot with help from Mavericks from the future. The Protolord is very slow due to its treads, but it is ruthless in combat. Be careful, as its hidden cutter blades will be pre-aimed for you.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 141
Form : Mechanical
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire, Ice and Holy Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks. Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A patrol unit with humanoid features under the armored division of Crosol. It is used for complex duties such as battling indoors and pursuing a target. It has very high level of combat abilities. It can even change its appearance, and is also able to ride on Nibergen. Mavericks can also perform duties independent of the order. The Maverick A is very efficient in melee-combat situations.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 143
Form : Mechanical
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire, Ice and Holy Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks. Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A patrol unit with humanoid features under the armored division of Crosol. It is used for complex duties such as battling indoors and pursuing a target. It has very high level of combat abilities. It can even change its appearance, and is also able to ride on Nibergen. Mavericks can also perform duties independent of the order. Maverick Y has a booster attached to it, which allows it to cover more area quicker than the model A.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 143
Form : Mechanical
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire, Ice and Holy Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks. Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A patrol unit with humanoid features under the armored division of Crosol. It is used for complex duties such as battling indoors and pursuing a target. It has very high level of combat abilities. It can even change its appearance, and is also able to ride on Nibergen. Mavericks can also perform duties independent of the order. Maverick V features excellent flying abilities, and is often used to attack and steal enemy vessels.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 145
Form : Mechanical
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire, Ice and Holy Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks. Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks.

Considered one of the ultimate robots developed by the Zipangu Army to combat the Army of Blaze, the Eruwater was a humanoid mech which contained human-like emotions, and was programmed to love peace. Unfortunately, the prototype was stolen by the Army of Blaze right before its completion, and the Eruwater had its programs on emotion deleted. Since then, this female robot has never smiled. It currently serves as one of the reserves for the independent unit of Blaze. Its beautiful appearence has taken many soldiers off-guard, and it has capitalized on this by slaughtering hundreds of the defenders of Zipangu.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 145
Form : Mechanical
Special Trait : 1st Body: Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice and Lightning Attribute Attacks. Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks.
2nd Body: Resistant (-50%) to Ice and Lightning Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks.
3rd Body: Resistant (-50%) to Fire and Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks. Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks.

Vergamot is the head of the Grosswall Unit, and is the central controller of all the ground units in the Army of Blaze. Only Core Blaze is above it in the strict chain of command. It was originally designed to merely control the units in the Army, but as it had freedom to call its own shots, it equipped itself with giant missiles and cannons, now holding its own as a very powerful and deadly combat robot.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 160
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks.

Once one of the protectors of Zipangu, Dunas's activities directly correlate to the destruction of Zipangu, which made it imperative for him to defeat Asia. With Dunas's ability to resurrect, even if he gets defeated in battle, he will simply rise again, in a new body in a new place. Asia was able to seal up Dunas's spirit by trapping him in Kamuna, where his spirit morphed into a strange magic monster, which cannot be named. In Kamuna, time stands still, which prevents his death, and therefore, his resurrection.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 152
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks. Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks.

Dunas was one of the early protectors of Zipangu. After finding out Ashray had been trapped at the end of Zipangu's future, he does everything he can to save her from the purgatory. Unfortunately, she is trapped in the world of nothing that was created after Zipangu's destruction, so the only way to save her is by changing history. Re-writing history is directly correlated to Zipangu's destruction, so Asia winds up binding Dunas's spirit inside the magic monster and placing it in Kamuna, a place where time stands still.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 158
Form : Mechanical
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice and Lightning Attribute Attacks. Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A battleship that contains the central system that controls all of the aircraft in the Army of Blaze. Vergamot takes charge of the soldiers on land, and Nibergen takes charge of the Tokyo skies. The battleship carries various forms of weaponry, and its combat abilities rival that of Vergamot.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Level : Lv.143
Type : Mechanical
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire, Ice and Holy Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks. Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A human-like robot registered under the Grosswall unit under the Army of Blaze. It is usually stationed inside the headquarters of the Army, which is the Roppongi Mall. Unlike other robots, this robot is equipped with a giant shield that is big enough to cover its whole body, and uses it to not only block attacks, but as a weapon too. It is also quick on its feet, which comes in handy when ambushing the opposition. The Imperial Guard is very well designed, and it can withstand a lot of punishment.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 60
Form : Human
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire and Holy Attribute Attacks.

A female ninja that was trained at Ninja Town. She used to live the life of a regular girl until one day, her fiance was brutally murdered by a monster. Kunoichi has dedicated her life to combat ever since. Her expertise is stealth observation, but ever since the Ninja Castle got sieged, she stopped hiding herself and started engaging in combat.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 175 
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

He may look like an old man with poor eyesight, but he is in fact a very old Flaming Raccoon. Somewhere along the way, he learned to transform himself into a human, and it has served him well. As a human, he was able to cleverly fool the residents of Showa, cheating them of their money in various ways. With time, he became an infamous figure among the criminals of Showa for his tasteless disregard of human life. His merciless ways have made him the leader of the large criminal organisation in Showa that he has called the Flaming Raccoon. He is simply known as The Boss, a name that serves his violent nature well. He is an incredibly dangerous and powerful opponent.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 80
Form : Animal

The black warrior bear that is found around the Shaolin mountains near Lushan Town. It studied the martial arts of the Shaolin Temple in secret, and practiced on its own in the mountains. Unlucky travellers of the mountain roads may encounter these bears. It is not uncommon for these bears to challenge the travellers to a death match.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 90
Form : Animal

The white tiger that lives around the Shaolin mountains near Lushan Town. It has studied the martial arts of the Shaolin Temple in secret for decades, making its abilities even more impressive. It is an honorable creature, but sometimes, in order to protect Shaolin's reputation and ancient scripts safe, it stops adventurers on the mountains roads and forbids them to go any further, often leading to bloodshed.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 95
Form : Animal

This giant eagle was injured many years ago and crashed into the mountains near Lushan Town. It was rescued and cared for by the Shaolin monks. Although the giant eagle was doomed to a life on the ground, as it could no longer fly, it studied the arts of Shaolin Kungfu and swore to defend the Shaolin Temple until its death.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 95
Form : Human

He is a member of a secret group that desires to steal the ancient scripts of the Shaolin Temple. If you run into one of these thieves, they will attack you ruthlessly. After being defeated, the thief will pull off one last trick, and disappear, leaving behind only a broken piece of wood.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 95
Form : Human

She is a member of a secret group that desires to steal the ancient scripts of the Shaolin Temple. She dresses in a traditional female manner, with all the traditional hair accessories, hoping this would improve her chances of getting into the Temple and stealing the scripts. If you run into one of these thieves, they will attack you ruthlessly. After being defeated, the thief will pull off one last trick, and disappear, leaving behind only a broken piece of wood.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 100
Form : Enchanted

This incense burner, used by the monks in the Shaolin Temple to worship Buddha and ask for the blessings of the God, gained life by absorbing the aura of the monks and the cultivation of Zen. It can sense the presence of hostility and weapons. After being defeated, it may drop special jade beads.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 105
Form : Enchanted

This wooden fish in the Shaolin Temple came to life because it absorbed the aura of the monks and the cultivation of Zen. Although it is immobile, it can sense disturbances and hostility in its surroundings, and will actively attack any passing adventurer who carries any weapons to the Temple.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 130 
Form : Enchanted 

An expertly trained martial artist who guards the sacred scripts in the Shaolin Temple. This shining gold monk should not be taken lightly. Although small in size, he is powerful enough to destroy any foe within seconds. If you manage to defeat him in an honorable fight, you can collect his golden heart as a trophy.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 120 
Form : Enchanted 

An expertly trained martial artist who guards the sacred scripts in the Shaolin Temple. This bronze monk should not be taken lightly. Although small in size and with a dull bronze skin, he is powerful enough to destroy any foe within seconds. He fights mercilessly, and will use any means necessary to protect the scripts. If you manage to beat him in an honorable fight, you can collect his bronze heart as a trophy.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 130 
Form : Enchanted 

A very strong martial artist who guards the ancient scripts of the Shaolin Temple. At first glance it appears to have a body of solid, dazzling gold, like a statue. It is however clearly alive, perhaps by some strange magic power. Its grim visage and immense power is enough to send chills down even the bravest challenger's spine. If you can beat this golden giant, you can collect its giant mace as proof.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 125 
Form : Enchanted 

A very strong martial artist who guards the ancient scripts of the Shaolin Temple. At first glance it appears to have a body of solid, shiny silver, like a statue. It is however clearly alive, perhaps by some strange magic power. Its grim visage and immense power is enough to send chills down even the bravest challenger's spine. If you can beat this silver giant, you can collect its giant stone hammer as proof.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 120 
Form : Enchanted 

An agile martial artist who guards the ancient scripts of the Shaolin Temple. At first glance it appears to have a body of a dull, bronze colour, like an old statue. It is however clearly alive, perhaps by some strange magic power. Its face shows no feelings, and its eyes are lifeless. It will sweep the floor with any unwanted visitor using the staff it carries. If you can beat this bronze demon, you can collect the prayer beads around its neck as proof.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 125 
Form : Enchanted

An agile martial artist who guards the ancient scripts of the Shaolin Temple. At first glance it appears to have a body of a shiny, silver colour, like an old statue. It is however clearly alive, perhaps by some strange magic power. Its face reveals no feelings, and its eyes are lifeless. It will sweep the floor with any unwanted visitor using the staff it carries. If you can beat this silver demon, you can collect the prayer beads around its neck as proof.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 150 
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

Wulin Yaoseng is the ultimate martial arts practitioner in the world. His ability is almost limitless, and he has mastery over every fighting technique, without any weaknesses. His mind and body are in complete balance and harmony. It is rumored that this master has never appeared in public because of an oath he has taken, to practice and meditate cut off from the rest of the world. Anyone who enters his chambers may challenge him, but few come out alive. There are rumors that he is actually a demon, possibly spread by those who envy his dedication and skill.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 140 
Form : Enchanted 

The clone of Wulin Yaoseng. It is unknown whether the clone is real, or just an illusion created by the martial arts master's focused mind. Regardless, the clone is immensely powerful and should not be underestimated.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 180
Form : Spirit

A monster that has been summoned by a mysterious man named Kirston using the Mirror of the Goddess. It doesn't seem that Kirston intentionally summoned Pink Bean. Although Pink Bean is a cute little creature, its power is beyond imagination. It is a very dangerous monster and should be approached with caution. One of its amazing powers is that it can revive a dead god. It seems to be a monster from another world.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 33 
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

Part of the Cellion family of monsters, this cute and fluffy little creature shares many of the same traits as its relatives in Orbis. Stay away from its inviting coat of soft black fur that is pink at the tips, as it is deceivingly hot! No one quite knows how this strange creature ended up on Amoria's beautiful plains. Contrary to its relatives in Orbis, the Sakura Cellion doesn't seem to grow up.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 95 
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : Immune to Fire, Ice, Holy and Poison Attribute Attackss.

Not much is known of the Geist Balrog. It shares many traits with the Crimson Balrog, although it is found in an entirely different part of the World. It is a large winged beast that has several forms, but it will only reveal its true form once thoroughly provoked. Folklore says that Geist Balrog is out to rob the world of emotion and feelings, and that triumphing over the Balrog is the ultimate proof of love.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 38 
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A lizard monster that wanders the beautiful plains of Amoria. This strange reptile is as evil and ill-tempered as its relatives on Victoria Island, but is much more beautiful. Just like the other monsters that roam Amoria, its origins are unknown, and it's widely believed that the Indigo Eyes are not even real, but a mere illusion.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 40 
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

This strange boar can be seen running around the plains of Amoria. Its leathery skin is white, and its back blazes with blue and white flames that strangely give off a chill instead of heat. It is a bizarre specimen of boar, and though it looks similar to its animal relatives on Victoria Island, this Crystal Boar has a distinct magical vibe to it. It may not even be real.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 19 
Form : Spirit

It's a monster made of a gelatinous substance similar to that of the cute green Slimes of Victoria Island. It also uses its own viscosity to jump around and bounce on unfortunate adventurers. But don't be fooled! Though it shares some traits with its cuter cousins, this Slime has been hardened in the overgrown streets and outskirts of New Leaf City. It is believed that the Slime was once a normal green Slime, but somehow became corrupted by the Masterian nature.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 21 
Form : Plant

It's a mushroom monster spotted around the outskirts of New Leaf City. It lives on the edge of the Krakian Jungle, but doesn't seem to like the moist environment deeper inside the jungle. Similar to its cousins on Maple Island and Victoria Island, it jumps around and won't move out of the way of Adventurers. It's a mean mushroom, possibly because of the rough surroundings in which it lives.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 25 
Form : Insect

Once a nice honeybee, it has now been reduced to a nightmarish cyborg-creation. It can be found in the dark and creepy MesoGears, which can be found underneath the Bigger Ben Clocktower in New Leaf City. It wears a strange headpiece which glows in the dark, and it will attack any Adventurer that it comes across.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 36 
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Poison Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Immune to Fire Attribute Attacks.

Once a big friendly elephant, probably grazing the plains of Masteria in the past. Today, like many of the other Masterian animals, it has now been modified into a cyborg monster with several cybernetic implants. It can spew flames out of its trunk, and won't hesitate to incinerate unsuspecting bypassers. It can be found in the MesoGears.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 41 
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Immune to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A great blue Elephant, which can be found lumbering around the outskirts of the Krakian Jungle and inside the dark MesoGears. Like its relative, the Fire Tusk, it has had its body modified with cybernetic implants. It wears a special headpiece from which it can shoot bursts of electricity. It is powerful, so it is best to avoid this beast.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 50 
Form : Mammal

The Gryphon is part of a mythical family of monsters. Great flying beasts with the wings and head of an eagle and the body of a lion, they can sometimes be spotted far above the Krakian Jungle canopy. They are not violent in nature, but are very territorial, so be sure not to stray too close to their nests.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 80 
Form : Enchanted

A mechanical mystery, the Wolf Spider can be found exclusively deep inside the MesoGears. It seems to lack intelligence of any sort, as it will simply walk around and bump into bypassers. If attacked, however, it can lock onto a target and will stop at nothing to pursue them. They are the strongest monster within the MesoGears, and are made entirely of rolled homogenous steel plating.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 44 
Form : Enchanted

It is a strange sight in the lush Krakian Jungle. The mechanical I.AM.ROBOT monster is an entirely artificial creation, beeping and booping as it traverses the uneven forest terrain. Although its origins are unclear, it shares many of the same electrical components as the cyborg animals around the same parts. It is not as strong as the mechanical Wolf Spider, so perhaps it is just a prototype, or a test-platform for cybernetic components.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 27 
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

It is a very unique monster, with no known relatives in the Maple World. The Boomer is a self-replicating machine which has the tendency to explode violently when touched. At first it was believed that the replication method was unstable, thus making the monsters prone to explode. But upon closer inspection, a fuse was discovered on top of the monsters, leading people to believe that the Boomer was designed to explode. To this day, no one is quite sure how the creature can create copies of itself, as the technology seems very futuristic.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 30 
Form : Plant
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks.

A great plant creature, which can be found exclusively on Masteria. It looks similar to the Nependeath flowers of Ossyria, although much bigger. It is speculated that the Mighty Maple Eater is a primitive, ancient cousin of the Nependeaths. It will strike nearby unsuspecting explorers with its 'tongue'. Despite its fearsome name, this plant is not very dangerous.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 101 
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks.

A very fierce monster that is sometimes seen walking the haunted paths of the Phantom Forest. The Headless Horseman is an ancient, possibly several thousand years old ghost of a man who was once named Killian. Killian was known for his mastery of fire, and he was in love with a sorceress named LeFay. One day, very long ago, both LeFay and Killian were captured by a great evil Alchemist who transformed LeFay into a pink horse. When Killian, who could not stand to live any longer after witnessing what was done to LeFay, tried to burn his own head off, the Alchemist simply replaced it with a pumpkin. Later on, a powerful Magician would cast a spell on the Horseman, which cursed him to wander the Phantom Forest, riding on the pink horse who was once his love, in an eternal, fruitless search for a head that no longer exists.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 21 
Form : Enchanted

A strange green ghost whose spirit has been corrupted by its gluttony. The Glutton Ghoul roams the Haunted House seeking out candy and other food to eat. Its gulttony will even cause it to attack adventurers for their food.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 30 
Form : Enchanted

Once a simple jack-in-the-box built to playfully scare children, the Psycho Jack has since become possessed by the evil that permeates through the Haunted Mansion. It has grown dark and evil enough to scare even the bravest warrior. These toys can be found all over the Haunted Mansion, either stationary in their box, or wandering the numerous rooms and halls.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 50 
Form : Enchanted

A possessed doll that was once Sophilia's favourite toy. Now that Sophilia is gone, these toys wander the Haunted Mansion, attacking anyone they come across. It is unknown who's ghostly hand controls the doll like a marionette.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 60 
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Affected by Heal.

The Voodoo is a product of horrific dark magics. Once an innocent soft toy, it is now a tormented possessed creature of nightmares. It can be found wandering the halls and rooms of the Haunted Mansion. It is very similar in appearance to the Hoodoo.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 60 
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Affected by Heal.

The Hoodoo is a product of horrific dark magics. Once an innocent soft toy, now it is a tormented possessed creature of nightmares. It can be found wandering the halls and rooms of the Haunted Mansion. It is very similar in appearance to the Voodoo.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 40 
Form : Enchanted

Once a large wooden rocking horse, made for Sophilia by her father to play with. The Nightmare now races the endless, maze-like hallways of the Haunted Mansion with its mane, its tail and its feet glowing in eerie, vibrant purple flames. It is now possessed by evil spirits.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 40 
Form : Animal

It is the vulnerable baby of the great Typhon. These eggs can be found in Typhon nests on the peaks of tall rocky formations near the Crimsonwood Keep. If you attack them, or even touch them, be prepared to have you face chewed off by its parents.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 100 
Form : Animal
Special Trait : Immune to Ice and Poison Attribute Attacks.

The Typhon is a very bizarre creature that resides in the perilous mountain cliffs near the old Crimsonwood Keep. Part goat, part lion and part eagle, it creates its nests on tall pillars of rock, out of reach for most explorers. While at first glance they might look similar to the Gryphons of the Krakian Jungle, make no mistake, Typhons are incredibly powerful and can use their strong wings to knock adventurers off the cliffs and back down into the Valley of Heroes. While they are not hostile in nature, if you get too close (especially to their babies) they might chew your face off.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 110 
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Immune to Ice and Holy Attribute Attacks.

The Bigfoot is a mythical creature whose very existence has been a hot debate for many centuries. Any adventurer unfortunate enough to stumble into it during their hike through the Phantom Forest, however, will tell you that he is very much real (if they are lucky enough to live to tell the tale). Actually, Bigfoot is believed to be a very friendly creature, who means no harm to anyone. Unfortunately he is so powerful that if he as much as steps on you, you're as good as dead. The Bigfoot is tricked by a mischievous Leprechaun to chase after a Lollipop held in front of its eyes, forever out of reach. The lure of the lollipop can make any encounter with Bigfoot in the forest a potentaily deadly situation, much to the Leprechaun's delight

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 70 
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait: Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks.

The Windraiders make up one of the factions of the Corrupt Army. They are trained by the Twisted Masters in the disciplines of the ancient Windreavers, but without their strict moral codes. As a result, they are dangerous and unpredictable. They use a crossbow powered by the winds that surround them.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 90 
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : 1st Form: Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.
2nd Form: Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Immune to Fire Attribute Attacks.

The Firebrands make up one of the factions of the Corrupt Army. They are trained by the Twisted Masters in the disciplines of the ancient Flamekeepers, but without their strict moral codes. As a result, they are extremely dangerous and unpredictable. They primarily use fire-based magic spells, but have been known to wield bows too.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 100 
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait: Immune to Ice and Poison Attribute Attacks.

The Nightshadows make up one of the factions of the Corrupt Army. They are trained by the Twisted Masters in the disciplines of the ancient Shadowknights, but without their strict moral codes. As a result, they are extremely dangerous and unpredictable. They are perhaps the most vicious warriors of the Corrupt Army, and fight using knives and short swords.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 95 
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks. Immune to Ice Attribute Attacks. Affected by Heal.

The Elder Wraiths are the spirits of Crimsonwood Keep heroes who fell in battle, but were never given a proper burial. Once the greatest warriors on the face of the Maple World, they now wander the Phantom Forest aimlessly, never finding their peace. They are attracted like a moth to a flame to any living adventurers who travel through the Phantom Forest, and the icy cold touch of these spirits can inflict enormous harm upon anyone who comes across them.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 80 
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : Immune to Lightning Attribute Attacks.

The Stormbreakers make up one of the factions of the Corrupt Army. They are trained by the Twisted Masters in the disciplines of the ancient Stormcasters, but without their strict moral codes. As a result, they are dangerous and unpredictable. They fight with spears, from which they can also shoot lightning.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 120 
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire, Ice, Lightning and Poison Attribute Attacks. Immune to Holy Attribute Attacks.

A truly marvelous and equally mysterious creature. They seem to combine the fighting tactics of each of the ancient Crimsonwood factions, wielding four different weapons at the same time. It is unknown whether they are humanoid in nature, or robotic. They seem to be the only creatures in Crimsonwood not under the influence of the Twisted Masters, as the Guardians are said to have existed even before the fall of the Keep. The hearts that power them are composed of a material unlike anything seen in Maple World. They have both very high attack and defense skills, resistance to all elemental damage, and can disable a person's skills, making them extremely dangerous in combat.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 45 
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks. Immune to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A strange creature, which seems to be highly intelligent. It uses its wit to lure unsuspecting adventurers into traps, after which is steals all of their belongings. The Leprechaun seems to do anything so long as its beneficial to itself. If you see a large bag of mesos on the ground of the Phantom Forest, do not approach it!

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 75 
Form : Plant
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A cursed tree which can be found in the mountains near the Crimsonwood Keep. They are also possessed by evil spirits of ancient times, but are much more powerful than the Phantom Trees found down in the Phantom Forest. If you see these bright red, evil-looking trees, stay away, or attack them from a distance and you should be able to scare away the spirit that possesses the tree.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 50 
Form : Plant
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A cursed tree which can be found everywhere in the Phantom Forest. They are possessed by evil spirits of ancient times, which imbues them with dark magics, and enables them to cast harmful spells on nearby travellers. If you see these dark, evil-looking trees, stay away, or attack them from a distance and you should be able to scare away the spirit that possesses the tree.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 130 
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire, Ice and Lightning Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks.

One of the Twisted Masters of Versal. Margana is the most enigmatic of the five Masters, and not much is known about her. She seems to be taking direct orders from the demon Naricain. She is extremely powerful, and she is in charge of training the entire magic-faction of the Corrupt Army. Her powers alone far exceed the combined forces of the army she is training.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 130 
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : Vulnerble (+50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks.

One of the Twisted Masters of Versal. Tribalistic in nature, the giant beast Red Nirg's origins are largely unknown. His raw physical strength is far greater than any of the other Twisted Master's, and his stamina is formidable. He wields a giant axe in each hand, which he swings around furiously with apparent ease. Red Nirg seems to be taking direct orders from the demon Naricain too.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 130 
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Immune to Holy Attribute Attacks.

One of the Twisted Masters of Versal. Rellik is the Quiet One. He attacks using a crossbow and wears goggles which are believed to grant him the ability to see into several dimensions at once. Not much is known of Rellik's past or origins, but he slays his opponents without showing any sign of emotion. He may have been a lone-wolf mercenary in Versal, but he is now strictly under the control of demon Naricain.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 130 
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Immune to Holy Attribute Attacks.

One of the Twisted Masters of Versal. He is the most vicious and aggressive of the Masters, seemingly enjoying violence and playing with his victims. He is exceptionally fast and agile, and wields claws and knives. He is taking orders from Naricain himself, although it is unknown how, or why.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 130 
Form : Enchanted

One of the Twisted Masters of Versal. Once a mighty Pirate King in Versal (or so the legend says), Gawyllacs controls the forces of the dark depths, and the tremendous powers of the Raging Versalian Sea. Whether or not his origin-story is true, one thing is certain: Gawyllacs is now under the control of the demon Naricain, and is training part of the Corrupt Army.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 20 
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks. Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks. Affected by Heal.

A truly horrifying creature. It is possibly the remains of an explorer who got lost in the hallways of the Mansion. It is one of, if not the only, organic creature found in the Haunted Mansion. It now slowly roams the Mansion, attacking anyone in sight, regardless of their intentions.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 50 
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Affected by Heal.

It is a possessed Scarecrow. It remains a mystery as to how, or why it ended up inside the Mansion. It will attack any adventurer with dark magics, and is very aggressive.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 70 
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Affected by Heal.

It's a Jester, twisted by dark and evil spells that have been cast on it. It is unclear whether or not it was ever human, but what is clear is that it will attack anyone and anything, and it is the most powerful being in the Haunted Mansion. Steer clear of these!

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 150
Form : Animal

Mu Gong used to be someone that dedicated his life to training at Mu Lung to become the Master. While training, he began to lose focus of the whole purpose of training, and began solely working on combat skills, which slowly skewed his view of the world and changed his personality. He began to be consumed with the thought of defeating everyone in the world with his combat skills, and built the Mu Lung Dojo to fulfill that purpose. He's been spending his later years testing out the combat skills of the Maple adventurers. According to various adventurers that have faced Mu Gong, he uses a spell that temporarily makes him young again.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Level: 70
Form: Enchanted
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A red mutated Slime that has recently taken up residence inside the spas at Showa Town. Although it may be a Slime, it shouldn't be taken lightly. It is a dangerous monster whose strength is much greater than the Green Slimes of Victoria Island. However, it still retains the nature of Slimes and will happily bounce around the spa that it has made its home.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 50
Form : Insect

A horrifying giant centipede. No one knows how it grew so large and grotesque. Legends say that it was born with a freak mutation in its genes, or that it was simply affected by some dark magic power. The Giant Centipede carries with it an aura of anger that somehow also affects all the animals in the fields, making them more aggressive.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 28 
Form : Animal

A slimy, poisonous toad which has a nasty tendency to attack unsuspecting explorers with its tongue. It doesn't taste nearly as good as its smaller frog companion, and it is much more dangerous. It's best to avoid it, really.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 8 
Form : Animal

A small frog that lives in the swampy regions around the Floating Market in Thailand. It mostly eats bugs all day, but will snack on the occasional explorer if it is hungry enough! It is popular amongst chefs who are after its tasty, chewy legs.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 60 
Form : Animal

The Python is the largest and strongest monster found around the Floating Market in Thailand. It is a giant snake, reminiscent of the small Jr. Necki. Be wary of its attacks, which can be fatal to many explorers. It is generally found farther into the jungle.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 40 
Form : Animal

The larger, meaner cousin of the yellow lizard. It is red in colour, and will spit at you whenever it gets the chance.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 25 
Form : Animal

A yellow lizard that can be found near, or in the swampy puddles outside Floating Market. If startled, it will drop its tail as a defensive mechanism and try to run away. It may attack you if it feels cornered and trapped, however.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 15 
Form : Animal

A common white rooster that tends to overestimate its strength and fear factor. As a result, it often gets into fights with explorers. It may be annoying to stumble into, but when cooked, it is delicious.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 80
Form : Spirit

The evil of Ulu City, Krexel, summons forth its darkest energies when it is on the brink of defeat. Bacal's prime directive is to protect Krexel. Its chaotic and unfocused approach can be seen as a representation of the dying tree's confused and desperate last efforts.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv.: 95
Form : Animal
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire and Holy Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

The snails that live in the ancient Ellin Forest are much bigger and far more powerful than the snails found in the present day. The Moss Snail is carnivorous and they have a tendency to remain stationary in one place for a long time, passively waiting for prey. Some say that's how moss could start growing on them. They will defend themselves with a powerful shockwave of sonic energy that can be heard throughout the forest for miles.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv.: 99
Form : Plant
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice and Holy Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

The mysterious tree monsters that can only be found in Ellin Forest are somewhat similar to Stumps in that they, too, resemble a tree stump. However, they are not dead, dry trees, but rather tree monsters that are very much alive and can grow flowers and berries. The Tree Rod may sometimes attack small animals, but they generally feed on nutrients they absorb using their roots. Other animals of the forest make their homes in these trees, and those animals will defend their homes if attacked.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv.: 104
Form : Insect
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire, Ice and Holy Attribute Attacks.

The strange Stone Bugs that live in Ellin Forest will feed on the moss found on rocks. Sometimes, after a good meal, they will fall asleep for months, which is how moss gets to grow on them. When threatened, the Stone Bug will use its large, heavy body to crush its attackers.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv.: 109
Form : Plant
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks.

Giant mushrooms that live in Ellin Forest. The Mossy Mushrooms are much bigger, bulkier and more vicious than the green mushrooms of the present day. They will slam the ground and release a cloud of spores at anyone who threatens them.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv.: 113
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire, Ice and Holy Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks.

Vicious boars that live in Ellin Forest. Boasting a notably thick coat of fur and tough hide, the Primitive Boar does not easily take damage even when attacked with a spear. When threatened, they will use their large tusks to pick up and throw rocks at their aggressors.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv.: 120
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire and Holy Attribute Attacks. Immune to Ice Attribute Attacks.

Large, tough and old, Chao is the strongest Boar in Ellin Forest. Chao bears many scars from his encounters with various creatures (and trees) in Ellin Forest. He's mostly blind, but makes up for it with his vicious anger, so don't underestimate him. Like the smaller boars, he will pick up and throw rocks at anyone who comes into his cave, but he will also jump high into the air and slam the ground, with devastating consequences. He also likes truffles.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv.: 110
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire, Ice and Holy Attribute Damage. Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks.

One of the primitive fairies residing in Ellin Forest. The Ancient Fairies are not like the refined fairies of the present day, instead attacking any intruder on sight. They can release a dangerous cloud of poison from the powder on their wings that can cause death within minutes if not cured. It is rumored that the Fierry of modern times is the decendent of these.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv.: 114
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire, Ice and Holy Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks.

A senior fairy of those living in Ellin Forest. The Shining Fairies have proven themselves worthy by showing a great talent for magic. Their poison is more potent than the Ancient Fairies'. They are the drones of Ephenia.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv.: 125
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire and Holy Attribute Attacks. Immune to Ice Attribute Attacks.

The Queen of the Fairies of Ellin Forest. Though her underlings are not very cultured, Ephenia herself is more reminiscent of modern day fairies. However, not long ago she fell under a dark spell, which instilled in her a violent hatred toward all humans. She is a powerful magician and knows a variety of spells that she won't hesitate to use on any human who would dare enter the Fairy Forest.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv.: 120/122/125
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire and Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks. Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A mysterious man once took over the east region of Ellin Forest in order to conduct questionable research in the effects of poison, and created these golems after destroying the forest. The Poison Golems are made of stone and, as defined in their name, are poisonous due to the layer of moss that covers their outer surface; it is also rumored that they can use magic. No one knows what purpose the mysterious man had in creating such creatures.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 125
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks.

These crocodile soldiers can be found around the outermost walls of Lionheart Castle. Loyal beyond the grave, they guard the gates to the castle, shackled by a terrible curse, and unaware that the kingdom fell into ruin hundreds of years ago. They will attack anyone, and anything, that trespasses within the castle.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 130
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

Reindeer spearmen who were given the power to channel lightning from the clashing clouds above. These soldiers strike with incredible power, as if they were in a frenzy of rage. They have patrolled the same routes for hundreds of years.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 141
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Ice Attribute Attacks.

Closely related to the Reindeer, these Elite Soldiers reacted more strongly to the influence of the Black Magician's curse. They attack with the same power of thunder and lightning like the regular Reindeer, but with far stronger power and ferocity. Be very careful around them.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 148
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attacks

One of the strongest enemies found in Lionheart Castle. This bear wields a morning star and rides on a ravenous wolf. Although they are just animals, they possess incredible powers, enough to strike down brave adventurers with a single blow. Why the two became a duo is unknown, but they are able to communicate and coordinate their moves with great effectiveness.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 144
Form : Animal
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks.

These strange creatures used to roam around the El Nath Mountains, preying on any unfortunate adventurers who lost their way. Several hundred years ago, a strange cry echoed between the mountains, which piqued the Vultures' interests. No one quite knows what happened thereafter, but ever since, they have served in the army of the Lion King as fierce, mindless drones.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 152
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks.

These golems rose out of the rubble of the crumbling castle walls over the centuries. Guarding the innermost walls of the castle, a strange magical fire has seeped into the rock, and breathed life into it. These unnatural soldiers make up the strongest legions in the Lion King's armies, despite not being actively recruited. It's as if these beings are the very embodiments of keeping the Lion King safe. If the adventurer gets too close, they will strike the ground with such a tremendous force that all around are sent flying.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 35
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks.

The Boogie is a creature from an ancient time, only found deep inside the volcanoes of El Nath. Why it resides in such a place is unknown. It seems to be attracted to Zakum, perhaps due to its penchant for corruption and destruction. It is often found near Zakum, acting as a guard and willfully attacks adventurers who would challenge Zakum. It can raise the attack power of Zakum and its other minions, and its touch can stun, leaving the adventurer at the mercy of Zakum's wrath.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 62
Form : Enchanted

Once decorative statues found in the ancient kingdom of Sharenian, the corruption of Ergoth has animated them and given them life. It now guards the ruins of the underground ancient kingdom, from treasure hunters and adventurers alike, serving Ergoth unquestionably.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 63
Form : Enchanted

Once simple pottery made by the ancient villagers who used to reside in the El Nath mountains, the power of Zakum has shaped the pottery into animated clay guardians. The Puco is a simple mindless servent, who only exists to serve Zakum's will.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 67
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks.

Once simple pottery made by the ancient villagers who used to reside in the El Nath mountains, the power of Zakum has shaped the pottery into animated clay guardians. Punco has hands that hold magical orbs, and it can use the power in the orbs to cast magical spells to attack invaders into Zakum's Altar.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 69
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks.

Once simple pottery made by the ancient villagers who used to reside in the El Nath mountains, the power of Zakum has shaped the pottery into animated clay guardians. Cuzco contains four hands, and strikes an eerily similar resemblence to Zakum itself. Like Punco, it can use the orbs it holds to cast strong magical spells to attack anyone who would challenge Zakum.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 70
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Lightning, Holy and Poison Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Immune to Ice Attribute Attacks

Countless weapons, armor and gear litter Zakum's Altar, a chilling reminder of the fate of those unfortunate or unlucky souls who were too weak or simply too foolish who challenged Zakum and failed. The magical energy within this lost and forgotten gear has been utilized by Zakum to help animate this guardian; and in a cruel twist of fate, the souls of those who once worshipped Zakum have been binded to these guardians, a reminder of the greed and cuelty Zakum embodies. Opachu is Zakum's most powerful guardian, and will separate into two Pachu after sustaining significant damage, who will continue to protect Zakum.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 80
Form : Mammal

Young panda cubs who have demonstrated significant potential to become master martial artists are hand picked by Mu Gong Mertis himself to train at the top of his tower. Still only a cub, Mingu has high hopes for its future under Mu Gong's tutelage, and rolls around the Dojo with unbridled determination!

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 100
Form : Enchanted

Wild birds of all types once roamed the ancient continent of Masteria, coexisting peacefully with the inhabitants of that time.
