Many of the archers of that time raised these wild birds as pets, training them to become powerful companions that would help defend the continent from invaders. This legacy of archer and bird companion was recorded in the ancient Masterian texts, which were later discovered by the corrupted Versal invaders. Rellik, the Twisted Master Archer of Versal, using this text as a guide, created his own twisted version of the once noble bird companions of the ancient Masterian acrhers. The Black Bird is now his servant, and it will attack by striking it's enemies with the dark fire that embodies it.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 130
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Lightning Attribute Attacks

The Kaede Toad is an underling of the Castellan Toad, the usurper of the Ninja Castle throne. Small and menacing, it will come to the aid of Castellan Toad whenever it is threatened. It is covered in a strange oil, which can be very valuable if traded to the right people.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 170
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire and Poison Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks

One of Auf Haven's powers is the ability to create clones of itself. Although the clone pales in comparison in power to the original, it is still a formiddable opponent, and will cause havoc when attacking in tandem with the real one.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 150
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks.

The inside of Von Leon's throne room bore witness to the anguish and heartberak Von Leon felt when the old Alliance destroyed his kingdom, killed his subjects, and murdered his wife. As the sole survivor of the old Alliance attack on his kingdom, that palpable feeing of gutwrenching agony was absorbed by the stone walls of the throne room. When the Black Mage granted Von Leon his new powers, that agony was given life, and now resides inside the Mini Castle Golem. This mobile stone contains a creature of heartbreak and revenge made manifest in the form of a blood red spirit. The anger and sorrow within this creature is so concentrated, it can be felt by anyone near it. Von Leon will summon a group of these creatures to help defend the throne room. It does not have a special attack, but it is dangerous due to how Von Leon will use it. If it is not destroyed quickly, Von Leon will make it self-destruct, which will free the spirit of anger locked within. Von Leon will then absorb the spirit and use that anger to heal himself.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 150
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy Attribute Attacks. Immune to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A gift to Von Leon from the Black Mage, the Demon Gargoyle is a fierce defender of the King's throne room, and will come to Von Leon's aid when he commands it. It has the ability to maipulate the magma inside the throne room and can summon slabs of molten rock from the lava to pierce and burn any unwelcome visitors. The gargoyle's ability to manipulate magma makes it a dangerous guardian, and it will protect Von Leon to the death.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 180
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Resistant (-50%) to Fire and Ice Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable (+50%) to Holy, Lightning and Poison Attribute Attacks

Von Leon was once the king of an ancient kingdom in the El Nath Mountains. When the Black Mage first began his destruction upon the Maple World, Von Leon decided not to get involved. The old Alliance that was forged to fight the Black Mage went to Von Leon to ask for his help, but Von Leon declined. Since his kingdom was small and remote, he didn't expect it to be a target of the Black Mage. The old Alliance saw Von Leon's refusal to join them as a sign that he was already corrupted by the Black Mage, and decided to raid his kingdom. Every citizen in the kingdom, including Von Leon's wife Ifia, were slain by the old Alliance soldiers, except for Von Leon himself.

Von Leon, having lost his kingdom, his people and most importantly his wife, joined the Black Mage out of despair and the promise of revenge. With the new power granted to him by the Black Mage, Von Leon easily enacted his revenge upon the old Alliance, destroying them with ease.

Centuries later, Von Leon still lingers in his throne room, wallowing in his madness, grief and despair. Anyone who steps foot into his castle will be met with extreme resistance from his corrupted guards. Von Leon himself was a very skilled swordsman in life, and his power has grown exponentially thanks to the Black Mage. He is an extremely powerful opponent, with devastating power, stamina and magical abilities. An expedition of strong willed Maple Heroes will be needed to topple this once-great King.
